▁Chi y ▁laad eb ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁Lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Bel én ▁tu by ▁gu ɨ d x ▁x te ▁Judea , ▁te ▁pur ▁ziy ▁g unii ▁profet ▁chi ▁g uni ib : </s> zab-Latn
▁Li ú ▁Bel én ▁tu by ▁gu ɨ d x ▁x te ▁Judea , ▁gati ▁li ú tiu ▁noo ▁gu ɨ d x ▁bi chi in ▁lo ▁ir aru ▁de ▁gu ɨ d x roo ▁x te ▁Judea . ▁Te ▁pur ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Bel én qu ɨ ▁id iac á ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ina bee , ▁ne ▁laab ▁i cu al ob ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁Israel ▁x tena . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁gur ɨ d x ▁x ga ats ▁Herodes ▁de ▁mag os qui ▁par ▁gun ab di id x b ɨ ▁laad eb ▁g ú cti pac ▁b dia cá ▁bal gui qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁laad eb ▁Bel én , ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Gul chia ▁ru y , ▁chiy ▁gul ga c beza ac ▁ir ate ▁pur ▁b doo qui . ▁Ne ▁chi ▁ab d xi alt ɨ by , ▁gul tix tee ▁lua a ▁te ▁par ▁cha lee ▁ch ato za ca by . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁gul ull ▁ra ip y ▁rey ▁Herodes ▁laad eb ▁ziy , ▁chiy ru ▁zé ga c deb . ▁Ne ▁bal gui ▁ni ▁gun á deb ▁desde ▁lad x deb , ▁la ani ▁zan ɨ ɨ d ni ▁lod eb ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁rut ▁nuu ▁b doo qui ▁guz ud x í ▁bal gui qui . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi ▁gu de ed ▁ni ▁z ía ▁de ▁mag os qui ▁lad x deb , ▁chiy ▁gü eli ulo ▁tu by ▁á ng l ɨ ▁x te ▁Dios ▁lo ▁G usé ▁lo ▁b ca ald , ▁ra ip y ▁á ng l ɨ qui ▁laab : ▁- ▁Qu eg ü este , ▁cu áa ▁b do oc ▁cun ▁x nan by . ▁Gul chia ▁nez ▁Egipto , ▁ru y ▁gul dez ▁a xt ▁chi ▁ini ia ▁laat . ▁Te ▁pur ▁sgu í ily ▁Herodes ▁b do oc ▁par ▁quin xú b ▁la aby . </s> zab-Latn

▁' De ▁b sl on ▁ná ▁ze c ▁tu by ▁bie eny ▁par ▁x cuer p ɨ n . ▁Ax ▁bela ti ▁cay unu ▁ni ▁ná ▁gü en , ▁idu ib te ▁x cuer pu ▁nap ▁bie en qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁bela ti ▁cay unu ▁ni ▁ná ▁mal , ▁idu ib te ▁x cuer pu ▁ná ▁ze c ▁rut ▁na cay , ▁¡ zec pa cza ▁l últ m ɨ ▁rut ▁na cay ! </s> zab-Latn
▁' R ute ete ▁qu ɨ t ▁tu ▁cha le eti ▁g ún ▁sir v ɨ ▁lo ▁ti op ▁lám , ▁te ▁pur ▁sd xi ch né b ▁tu by b ɨ ▁chiy ▁ax ▁sca az b ɨ ▁stu by b ɨ , ▁o ▁za cza c b ɨ ▁gü en ▁cun ▁tu by b ɨ ▁ax ▁zun b ɨ ▁des pres y ▁stu by b ɨ . ▁Pur ▁ning ui ▁qu ɨ t ▁xo ▁g ún tit ▁sir v ɨ ▁lo ▁Dios ▁ne ▁lo ▁m ɨ ly . </s> zab-Latn
▁' N are ▁r ni ia ▁laat : ▁Qu ɨ t ▁chú ut ▁gu el r saa ▁pur ▁ni ▁i qui int ɨ ▁ne ▁pur ▁ni ▁gu é et , ▁ni cl ɨ ▁pur ▁de ▁lady ▁ni ▁ga cut ɨ . ▁Gu el nab ány ▁maz ru ▁sac ▁que ▁ni ▁i qui iny ▁b ni ety , ▁ne ▁x cuer p ɨ ▁b ni ety ▁maz ru ▁sac ▁que ▁lady . </s> zab-Latn
▁Gul gu iaa ▁de ▁mani in ▁ni ▁cand za ▁lla ya baa . ▁Nic l ɨ ▁qu ɨ t ▁rund em ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁lo ▁gui ix ▁ni cl ɨ ▁qu ɨ t ▁r te edem ▁de ▁gu elna za ac , ▁ni cl ɨ ▁qu ɨ tti ▁li zdem ▁rut ▁chu chuu ▁gu elna za ac , ▁per ▁X tad n ɨ ▁Dios ▁ni ▁r bez ▁lla ya baa ▁r gua ad ▁ni ▁god em . ▁¡ L atix cu ▁laat ▁maz ru ▁sa ct ɨ ▁que ▁de ▁mani in ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁ziy za , ▁¿ t atix ▁pur ▁cu enzi pac ▁chú u ▁b ni ety ▁gu el r saa ▁ax ▁aga c ▁b ni ety ▁maz ru ▁zi u ul ? </s> zab-Latn
▁' ¿ X í nii ▁ru ut ▁gu el r saa ▁pur ▁lady ? ▁Gul gu iaa ▁xa ▁x quel ▁r eroo ▁de ▁gu iaa ▁lo ▁gui ix . ▁X íte ete ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁qu ɨ t ▁run tid eni ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t za ▁r gu ib tid eni , </s> zab-Latn
▁per ▁ni cl ɨ ▁rey ▁Salomón ▁qu ɨ t ▁gu zu chuu ti ▁ze c ▁ni ▁zu chuu ▁de ▁gu iaa ▁mas qu ɨ ▁más ▁gu zu chu ub . </s> zab-Latn
▁Pur ▁ning ui , ▁de ▁cu ang ui ix cla ▁an re ▁r su chuu ▁Dios ni ▁mas qu ɨ ▁il lí ▁a ▁ná ni ▁par ▁chaa ic qu ini . ▁¡ L atix cu ▁laat , ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁gul lie e zy ▁rel dila az ▁la any , ▁qu ɨ t ▁ig ua ad ny ▁ni ▁ga cut ɨ ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Pur ▁ning ui , ▁qu ɨ tru ▁ru ut ▁gu el r saa ▁pur ▁ni ▁i qui int ɨ , ▁o ▁pur ▁ni ▁gu é et , ▁o ▁pur ▁ni ▁ga cut ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁rel dila az ▁Dios , ▁laad eb ▁ruu deb ▁gu el r saa ▁pur ▁ir ate ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ . ▁Per ▁laat ▁na pt ɨ ▁tu by ▁X tad t ɨ ▁lla ya baa , ▁ne ▁la any ▁nan chu uny ▁xi ▁run lie ed xt ɨ . </s> zab-Latn

▁Qu ɨ t ▁cu be eti u ▁stu by ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁pur ▁falt ▁bi chi in ▁ni ▁nap deb , ▁gü en ru ▁guu ▁gu el r saa ▁pur ▁de ▁f altro o ▁ni ▁cay unu . </s> zab-Latn

▁' Qu ɨ t ▁g ún tit ▁pur ▁g ún pac ▁de ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁r ca az ▁g ún ▁cu end ▁ni ▁zé ed ▁pur ▁Dios , ▁te ▁qu ɨ t ▁xi ▁gun né deb ▁laat . ▁Te ▁pur ▁bela ti ▁g ún t ɨ ▁ziy , ▁niy ▁ná ▁ze c pa cza ▁chi ▁r c uaa ▁b ni ety ▁tu by ▁cos ▁ni ▁abia cl dee ▁lo ▁bee cu . ▁Nic l ɨ za ▁qu ɨ t ▁g ún tit ▁ziy ▁cun ▁de ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁r d x ala az ▁ni ▁zé ed ▁pur ▁Dios . ▁Te ▁pur ▁bela ti ▁g ún t ɨ ▁ziy , ▁niy ▁ná ▁ze c pa cza ▁chi ▁r c uaa ▁b ni ety ▁tu by ▁cos ▁ni ▁sac ▁lo ▁cu ch ▁ne ▁chiy ▁ax ▁chaa ip zim ▁qui ani . </s> zab-Latn
▁' N are ▁r ni ia ▁laat : ▁Gul na ab ▁lo ▁Dios ▁ne ▁la any ▁s gua ad qu ɨ ny ▁ni ▁r caa zt ɨ . ▁G ult í il ny ▁ne ▁sd xi al qu ɨ t ny . ▁G ult ɨ d x ▁gul na ab ▁lony , ▁ne ▁zun qu ɨ ny ▁cu end ▁laat . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁r na ab , ▁sc á ab . ▁Ne ▁ni ▁r gu í ily , ▁sd xi al qu ɨ b ni . ▁Ne ▁ni ▁r gui in ▁r na ab ▁lony , ▁zun qu ɨ ny ▁cu end ▁laab . </s> zab-Latn

▁' G ul ga any ▁pur ▁yii ut ▁ruu ▁pu ert ▁ni ▁ná ▁dee . ▁Te ▁pur ▁ruu ▁pu ert roo ▁ne ▁nez roo , ▁niy ▁ná ▁ni ▁z éne ▁b ni ety ▁nez ▁mal ▁ne ▁zi ende b ▁zé ▁nez qui . </s> zab-Latn

▁' Z iy za ▁gul cu alo ▁cun ▁de ▁b ɨ ndi xú ▁ni ▁r nii ▁dec ▁pur ▁Dios ▁zé ed deb . ▁Te ▁pur ▁laad eb ▁la zu ▁qu esenti and ▁nado la az deb , ▁per ▁run zid eb ▁par zí ▁g ún deb ▁eng any ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁zum bee ct ɨ ▁tú ▁laad eb ▁pur ▁ni ▁run deb , ▁te ▁pur ▁qu ɨ t ▁r cati ▁uv ▁lo ▁y agu ɨ ́ ch ▁ni cl ɨ za ▁qu ɨ t ▁r cati ▁hig ▁lo ▁de ▁cu ang ui ix . </s> zab-Latn

▁Qu ɨ t ▁r cati ▁frut ▁ni ▁nad xab ▁lo ▁yag ▁za ac ▁ni cl ɨ za ▁qu ɨ t ▁r cati ▁frut ▁za ac ▁lo ▁yag ▁d xab . </s> zab-Latn

▁' Ne ▁gati ▁ir ati ▁de ▁ni ▁ini i ▁nare : ▁" Dad , ▁Dad , " ▁yii u ▁rut ▁cana bee ▁Dios ▁sino ▁que ▁p úr zi ▁de ▁ni ▁cay un ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r ca az ▁X tada ▁ni ▁r bez ▁lla ya baa . </s> zab-Latn
▁D xi qui ▁zi enzi ▁de ▁ni ▁ini i ▁nare : ▁" Dad , ▁Dad , ▁dun n ɨ ▁qu esenti and ▁ab t ɨ ɨ chn ɨ ▁di id x ▁pur ▁laa biu , ▁pur ▁ni ▁b ze et n ɨ ▁lá biu ▁gul éen ▁de ▁b ɨ nd xab ▁lá ani ▁de ▁b ni ety , ▁ne ▁pur ▁ni ▁b ze et za cn ɨ ▁lá biu ▁ax ▁gü ele e ▁b d x ann ɨ ▁zi eny ▁de ▁milag r ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn

▁Per ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁rind iag ▁ni ▁r ni ia ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t ▁r cu adia gb ɨ ▁x ti id xa , ▁laab ▁ná b ▁ze c ▁tu by ▁b ɨ nt ont ▁ni ▁rzu ub ▁li zni ▁lo ▁yi ul ly . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁b ld í ▁Jesús ▁na any ▁b gua ald ny ▁laab , ▁g uni ig any : ▁- ▁R ca az la . ▁Qu eb iac . ▁Chi ▁g unii ▁Jesús ▁ziy , ▁hó rac qui ▁gu bic á ▁gu el gu id x qui ▁ax ▁b ía ▁t ɨ ɨ x b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁B cu adia g ▁ni ▁ini ia ▁li ú . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁tu ▁cha ga ip tiu ▁dec ▁abia cu . ▁Lo ▁b xo zzi ▁gü eli uu ▁li ú , ▁ne ▁gü ené ▁ni ▁ri ál d ▁chan íu ▁lo ▁Dios ▁ze c ▁ni ▁g unii ▁Moisés , ▁par ▁gac bee ▁ir ate ▁b ni ety ▁dec ▁abia cu . </s> zab-Latn

▁Te ▁pur ▁ziy za ▁nare ▁r cu adia ga ▁x ti id x ▁de ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁naa ▁par ▁cha lee ▁i cu adia g za ▁de ▁s uld ad ▁x tena ▁x ti id xa . ▁Chi ▁gap ia ▁tu by b ɨ ▁chia b ▁ax ▁z éb . ▁Chi ▁gap ia ▁stu by b ɨ ▁dec ▁gue ed b ɨ ▁ax ▁zé edza c b ɨ . ▁Ne ▁chi ▁r nabi ia ▁x m osa ▁xi ▁cha ga any b ɨ , ▁ax ▁rega any b ɨ ▁ni ▁ra ip ia b . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁Jesús ▁ziy , ▁qu esenti and ▁b d xal ony ▁pur ▁de ▁x ti id x ▁capitán qui ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zan ald ▁la any : ▁- ▁R gui x ti ia ▁lot , ▁per ▁ni cl ɨ ▁Israel ▁g ady ▁id xi al tia ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁qu esenti and ▁rel dila az ▁Dios ▁ze c ▁ni ▁rel dila az ▁b niet qu ɨ ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁zi engu illi ú ▁b ni ety ▁ir ane zte ▁y ál d ▁yi un é ▁to ▁Abraham , ▁to ▁Isaac , ▁ne ▁to ▁Jacob ▁rut ▁cana bee ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn

▁D eni ▁gü e ▁Jesús ▁liz ▁Bed , ▁la any ▁gun ány ▁x n ans uer gr ɨ ▁Bed , ▁ná ga ab ▁nu ub ▁x lia a . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi ▁gun á ▁Jesús ▁zi engu illi ú ▁b ni ety ▁abdii ▁la any , ▁ax ▁guna be eny ▁par ▁ted né ny ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁dets ▁nis ▁ni ▁ná ▁ru y . </s> zab-Latn

▁Ax ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁De ▁beg u ▁nuu ▁x cue v dem , ▁ne ▁de ▁mani in ▁nuu ▁x pit iaa zdem . ▁Per ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁qu ɨ t ▁nap tia ▁ni cl ɨ ▁rut ▁qui x qu iaa . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁tu by ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁la any : ▁- ▁Dad , ▁b saan biu ▁su guan ía ▁x tada ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁chi ▁gat yb ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁ra ip ny ▁laab : ▁- ▁Qu edan ald ▁nare , ▁b sá an ▁x t adu ▁cun ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁r ca az ▁san ald ▁nare . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁bii uny ▁lá ani ▁bar cu ▁cun ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny , </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁gü ec ua any ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁la any , ▁ra ip deb ny : ▁- ▁¡ Dad , ▁guc né biu ▁dun n ɨ ! ▁¡ A ▁dun n ɨ ▁ac ayaa iz n ɨ ▁lá ani ▁nis ! </s> zab-Latn
▁La any ▁cua ib ny ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁cu enzi ▁r d x ibt ɨ ? ▁¡ X í pal za ▁gul lia aza ▁rel di laa zt ɨ ▁nare ! ▁Chi y ru ▁gü est eny ▁ax ▁cun ▁x ti id x ny ▁b cue zny ▁bi ▁ne ▁nis qui . ▁Hó rac qui ▁ir ate ▁gur id x í . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁b d xal od eb ▁ne ▁gun ab did x sa ad eb : ▁- ▁¿ T úd xa za ▁b niet qu ɨ , ▁ning ui ▁a xt ▁bi ▁ne ▁nis ▁r cu adia g ▁x ti id x ny ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁Jesús ▁stu by ▁lad ▁nis qui , ▁lo ▁liu ▁x te ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁Gad ara , ▁chiy ▁ti op ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁ni ▁nuu ▁b ɨ nd xab ▁lá anni ▁b dii ad eb ▁g lay ▁de ▁baa ▁ax ▁gü eb inuu deb ▁Jesús . ▁La ad eb ▁qu esenti and ▁cu end roo ▁rac deb , ▁n iala az deb , ▁par zi ▁rute ete ▁qu ɨ t ▁tu ▁rele eti ▁teed ▁nez qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁gun á deb ▁Jesús ▁ax ▁gur ɨ x ti ad eb : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁ri uté biu ▁cun ▁dun n ɨ , ▁Jesús , ▁Lli in ▁Dios ? ▁¿ Ta ▁zé ed biu ▁rur én ▁par ▁ite ed biu ▁dun n ɨ ▁gu el zii ▁an ste ▁ni ▁id z ɨ ny ▁d xi ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁ga x ▁nez qui ▁ri ▁zi eny ▁cu ch ▁ni ▁c ayo , </s> zab-Latn
▁ax ▁ban las ▁de ▁b ɨ nd xab qui ▁lo ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Bela ti ▁cu ée biu ▁dun n ɨ , ▁b saan biu ▁id xú un ▁lá ani ▁de ▁cu ch re . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁g unii ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Gul chia . ▁Chi y ru ▁b di ia ▁de ▁b ɨ nd xab qui ▁lá ani ▁de ▁b niet qui ▁ax ▁bii ud eng ui ▁lá ani ▁de ▁cu ch qui . ▁Chi y ▁ir ate ▁de ▁cu ch qui ▁guz ulo ▁r llu u ind em ▁ax ▁gü e yab dem ▁ruu ▁tu by ▁bar ran c ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁lo ▁nis ▁rut ▁gua apy ▁nis ▁qui adem ▁ax ▁gut yd em . </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ca cu alo ▁de ▁cu ch qui , ▁bl lu u inde b . ▁Chi y ▁chi ▁b dz ɨ n deb ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x ▁ax ▁guz ulo ▁gu di xte ed eb ▁ir ate ▁ni ▁guc ▁ne ▁ir ate ▁xa ▁x quel ▁gu de ed ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁guu ▁de ▁b ɨ nd xab qui ▁lá anni . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ir ate ▁b ɨ ngu ɨ d x qui ▁b di ia ▁gü e ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁Jesús , ▁ax ▁chi ▁gun á deb ▁la any , ▁ban las deb ▁lony ▁par ▁idi i any ▁lad x deb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁bi iu ▁Jesús ▁lá ani ▁tu by ▁bar cu ▁par ▁gu de ed ny ▁dets ▁nis qui ▁ax ▁b dz ɨ n ny ▁lad x ny . </s> zab-Latn
▁R uy ▁gü ené ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁ni ▁ag uty ▁t ɨ ɨ x ni , ▁ná ga ab ▁lo ▁daa ▁x ten b ɨ . ▁Chi ▁gun á ▁Jesús ▁dec ▁laad eb ▁rel dila az deb ▁la any ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁b ni ety ▁rac xú qui : ▁- ▁Gu zac laa zu ▁ll inga ana . ▁Aba ania ▁perd ón ▁de ▁x tul du . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁tu by ▁ti op ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley ▁ba ande b ▁x gab : ▁" B niet qu ɨ ▁r sa cl ob ▁Dios ▁cun ▁de ▁x ti id x b ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁cun ▁Jesús ▁guc be ega c ny ▁xi ▁x gab ▁cay undeb , ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁runt ɨ ▁mal ▁x gab ? </s> zab-Latn
▁¿ C ún ▁ni ▁nag án ru ▁par ▁gac ? ▁¿ Ta ▁gap ia b : ▁" Aba ania ▁perd ón ▁de ▁x tul du , " ▁o ▁gap ia b : ▁" G ü este , ▁qu egu za "? </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁an re ▁ili u ua ▁laat ▁dec ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁napa ▁gu el r na bee ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch li uré ▁par ▁g úna ▁perd ón ▁de ▁d uld . ▁Chi y ru ▁ax ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁b ni ety ▁rac xú qui : ▁- ▁Qu eg ü este . ▁Cu áa ▁daa ▁x ten u . ▁Qu eb ia ▁lizu . </s> zab-Latn
▁As ▁gü este ▁b niet qui ▁ax ▁zí ab ▁liz b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi ▁b di ia ▁Jesús ▁ru y , ▁deni ▁z ény ▁ax ▁gun ány ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁ni ▁lá ▁Made u . ▁La ab ▁zub b ɨ ▁rut ▁run b ɨ ▁cob r ɨ ▁x te ▁de ▁impu est , ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laab : ▁- ▁Guz an ald ▁nare . ▁Chi y ru ▁gü es ú ▁Made u ▁zen ald b ɨ ▁Jesús . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi g uld ▁deni ▁ca qui iny ▁Jesús ▁liz ▁Made u ▁cun ▁ir aru ▁de ▁ni ▁run ▁cob r ɨ ▁x te ▁impu est ▁ne ▁cun ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁nab ány ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁ley ▁ni ▁zen uu ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁Israel , ▁ir ated eb ▁zub né deb ▁Jesús ▁lo ▁m ɨ l ly ▁cun ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁Jesús ▁xi ▁cani id eb , ▁ax ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁De ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁naza ac ▁ne ▁ni ▁nada an ▁qu ɨ t ▁xi ▁lie ed x ti ▁rac deb ▁doctor ▁sino ▁que ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁rac xú , ▁laad eb ɨ y ▁rac lie ed x deb ▁doctor . </s> zab-Latn
▁Gul chia ▁ne ▁gul se ed ▁xi ▁zelo ▁x ti id x ▁Dios ▁rut ▁r nii : ▁" Ni ▁maz ru ▁r caa za ▁ná ▁i las laa zt ɨ ▁saa ▁b ni ett ɨ ▁x lat ▁ni ▁xi ▁g úng unt ɨ ▁par ▁nare . " ▁An re , ▁nare ▁qu ɨ t ▁z eld tia ▁par ▁de ▁ni ▁ná ▁gü en ▁sino ▁que ▁nare ▁zel da ▁par ▁de ▁b ɨ nd uld ▁te ▁par ▁y iala az deb ▁pur ▁de ▁x t uld deb . </s> zab-Latn

▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁Rut ▁rac ▁tu by ▁saa , ▁¿ t atix ▁ruu ▁de ▁bio os ▁na las ▁chi ▁zugu ané ▁bí iny ▁laad eb ? ▁Per ▁ter u ▁id z ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁ni ▁ibi cá ▁bí iny , ▁chiy ru ▁i cu u ande b . </s> zab-Latn
▁' R ute ete ▁qu ɨ t ▁tu ▁r cua ati ▁r mi and ▁tu by ▁la dii ux y ▁cun ▁tu by ▁l daa ▁lady ▁cub y ▁pur ▁ni ▁r l liu un ▁lady ▁cub y qui , ▁ax ▁maz ru ▁r gu illa ang ui ▁la dii ux qui . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi ▁gul ull ▁g unii ▁Jesús ▁ziy , ▁chiy ▁b dii any ▁nez ▁Galilea ▁ax ▁b dz ɨ n ny ▁nez ▁Judea ▁ni ▁ná ▁stu by ▁lad ▁dets ▁gue eu ▁Jordán . </s> zab-Latn
▁Zi eny ▁b ni ety ▁gu zan ald ▁la any , ▁chiy ▁ru y ▁b sia c ny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁rac xú . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁du ud x ▁de ▁farise u ▁gü eb inuu deb ▁Jesús , ▁ne ▁par ▁g ún deb ▁prueb ▁la any ▁ax ▁gun ab di id x deb ny : ▁- ▁¿ Ta ▁zele e ▁l dá a ▁b ni ety ▁chi alni ▁pur ▁xit ill ▁cos ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁¿ Ta ▁g ady ▁gu uld t ɨ ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁lo qui ▁r nii ▁dec ▁desde ▁g ulo ▁Dios ▁" ban chu uny ▁ng uiu ▁ne ▁guna a ?" </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax : ▁" P ur ▁ning ui ▁ng uiu ▁r sá an b ɨ ▁x tad b ɨ ▁cun ▁x nan b ɨ ▁par ▁ib any né b ▁chi alb ɨ , ▁chiy ▁ir op ted eb ▁an á deb ▁ze c ▁tu by zi ▁b ni ety . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ▁x quel ▁aqu ɨ t ▁ná ti deb ▁ti op ▁sino ▁que ▁tu by zi . ▁Pur ▁ning ui , ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁il d asa ab ▁ni ▁ab ch asaa ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁de ▁farise u ▁ra ip deb ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁¿ X iz ani ▁g unii ▁Moisés ▁dec ▁zele e ▁l dá a ▁b ni ety ▁chi alni , ▁cunt isy ▁gac chuu ▁gui its ▁dec ▁ag ul á ad eb ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁B saan la ▁Moisés ▁gac ▁ziy ▁pur ▁caus ɨ ▁qu ɨ t ▁r cu adia gt ɨ ▁di id x , ▁per ▁gati ▁zi yti ▁ná ▁ni ▁rac ▁des d ɨ ▁g ulo . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁laat , ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁l dá a ▁chi alni ▁ne ▁bela ti ▁gati ▁pur ti ▁ráp ▁chi alb ɨ ▁stu by ▁ng uiu ▁o ▁stu by ▁guna a ▁ning ui ▁l dá ad eb , ▁ne ▁chiy ▁cha gu ch na ab ▁cun ▁stu by ▁ir ɨ n qu ɨ ▁ax ▁dul diy ▁run b ɨ . ▁Ne ▁ni ▁ru ch naa ▁cun ▁tu by ▁ni ▁teste ▁gul áa ▁chi alni , ▁ziy za ▁dul diy ▁run b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁g unii ▁de ▁x p ɨ ny ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Bela ti ▁ziy ▁ná ▁gu el gu ch naa , ▁gü en ru ▁qu ɨ t ▁gu ch na ati ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁G ati ▁ir ati ▁b ni ety ▁zele e ▁gac bee ▁ni ▁cani ia , ▁sino ▁que ▁de ▁ni ▁agu udzi ▁gu el ri eny ▁par ▁gac be eni . </s> zab-Latn
▁Nuu ▁b ni ety ▁desde ▁ral b ɨ ▁qu ɨ t ▁zé ed tib ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁par ▁gu ch na ab , ▁nu uz ad eb ▁rac deb ▁r m ɨ dy ▁par ▁qu ɨ t ▁gu ch na ad eb , ▁chiy ▁nu uza ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁run ▁x gab ▁dec ▁gü en ru ▁it ɨ ɨ ch deb ▁de ▁did x za ac ▁x te ▁Dios ▁x lat ▁ni ▁gu ch na ad eb . ▁De ▁ni ▁r lilo ▁dec ▁zele e ▁ib ány deb ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁gu ch na at id eb , ▁ax ▁qu ɨ t ▁gu ch na at id eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁b ni ety ▁gü ené deb ▁de ▁b nini in ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁Jesús ▁par ▁iz ub na any ▁qui ad eby ▁ne ▁par ▁ina ab ny ▁lo ▁Dios ▁pur ▁laad eby . ▁Per ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁guz ulo ▁r d ild né deb ▁de ▁ni ▁gü ené ▁laad eby . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁r ni iu ▁dec ▁gü en ▁naa ? ▁Qu ɨ tru ▁tu ▁ná ti ▁gü en , ▁qu es ol tis y ▁Dios ▁ná ▁gü en . ▁Per ▁bela ti ▁r caa zu ▁gapu ▁gu el nab ány ▁par ▁cha zy , ▁ba any ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r nii ▁de ▁mand ami ent . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁g unii ▁b niet qui : ▁- ▁¿ Xi ▁de ▁mand ami ent ? ▁Ax ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁Qu ɨ t ▁quin xú tiu ▁b ni ety . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁gapu ▁stu by ▁guna a . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁ga ctiu ▁gu baan . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁gü e eti u ▁dix ú ▁pur ▁de ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁G úp ▁did x doo ▁x t adu ▁ne ▁x n anu , ▁ne ▁b ca az ▁de ▁saa ▁b ni eti u ▁ze cac ▁li ú . </s> zab-Latn

▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁N are ▁r gui x ti ia ▁lot ▁dec ▁chi ▁id z ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁ni ▁ic uby ▁ir ate , ▁chi ▁id z ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁ni ▁cu iaa ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁lo ▁yal li ly ▁rut ▁ina bi ia , ▁chiy ▁laat ▁ni ▁zan ald t ɨ ▁nare ▁s bet ▁lo ▁ts ɨ bti op ▁yal li ly ▁par ▁g ún t ɨ ▁gu elg urt isy ▁ir ate ▁de ▁ni ▁zá ▁lo ▁ts ɨ bti op ▁family ▁x te ▁Israel . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi g uld ▁ze cti ▁r ca ▁ga ay ▁gud xi , ▁gub íi ▁b di ia b ▁stu by . ▁Gü eb ▁nez ▁lo ▁gue e , ▁chiy ▁b d xi alb ɨ ▁stu ud x ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁cay unti ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny . ▁Ax ▁gun ab di id x b ɨ ▁laad eb : ▁"¿ X í nii ▁ag ud edd xi ▁zug ua at ▁r uc ▁qu ɨ t ▁cay unt it ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ?" </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁b niet qui ▁cua ib deb : ▁" Te ▁pur ▁rute ete ▁g ady ▁tu ▁in ɨ ɨ d x ti ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁dun n ɨ . " ▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁laad eb : ▁" G ul cha ga any ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁lo ▁l lia a , ▁nare ▁qu illa ▁laat ▁ze cti ▁ni ▁ri ál d . " </s> zab-Latn

▁Ax ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁de ▁ni ▁bi iu ▁lo ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁r ca ▁ga ay ▁gud xi , ▁ir ate c deb ▁cu á ad eb ▁ze ctic ▁ni ▁rac ▁gan ▁tu by ▁d xi . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi g uld ▁par ▁gall ▁de ▁ni ▁bi iu ▁lo ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁sidoo , ▁laad eb ▁ba ande b ▁x gab ▁dec ▁guy ally ru ▁nic á ad eb . ▁Per ▁zi yti zia c ▁cu á ad eb , ▁ze cti zia c ▁ni ▁rac ▁gan ▁tu by ▁d xi . </s> zab-Latn

▁- ▁Laat ▁n ánt ɨ ▁dec ▁azo on ▁Jerusalén . ▁R uy ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁za ca ▁ent ria gu ▁lo ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ne ▁lo ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley , ▁chiy ▁laad eb ▁ina beed eb ▁gat ia . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z undeb ▁ent ria gu ▁nare ▁lo ▁de ▁b ɨ nz ít ▁par ▁g ún deb ▁bur l ɨ ▁naa ▁ne ▁par ▁i taa z deb ▁naa . ▁Chi y ▁ic ua ad eb ▁naa ▁lo ▁cru zy , ▁per ▁ni ▁ri on ▁d xi ▁s bí i ▁ib án ia ▁stu by . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi al ▁Zeb ede o ▁gub in éb ▁ir op te ▁lli in b ɨ ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁Jesús , ▁chiy ▁gu zul li bb ɨ ▁lony ▁par ▁ina abb ɨ ▁ni ▁r ca az b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁¿ Xi ▁r caa zu ? ▁La ab ▁cua ib b ɨ : ▁- ▁N are ▁r caa za ▁dec ▁chi ▁ac ana bee biu ▁chiy ▁isi ál d biu ▁tu by ▁lli inia ▁cue ▁lad ▁n ald í ▁x ten biu , ▁chiy ▁stu by ▁lli inia ▁cue ▁lad ▁r bes ▁x ten biu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁ra ip y ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Laat ▁qu ɨ t ▁gán tit ▁xing ▁r na ab t ɨ . ▁¿ T atix ▁zele e ▁te edt ɨ ▁gu el zii ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ná ▁par ▁teda ? ▁La ad eb ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁Z ele ela . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁cua by ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Did x ld í qu ɨ y ▁s de edt ɨ ▁gu el zii ▁ze c ▁nare , ▁per ▁ni ▁cu et ▁lad ▁n ald í ▁o ▁lad ▁r bes za ▁x tena , ▁gati ▁nar etia ▁ri ál d ▁in ɨ ɨ d xani ▁laat , ▁te ▁pur ▁la ani ▁a ▁ná ni ▁par ▁de ▁ni ▁ab cua bee ▁X tada ▁Dios ▁y ál d ni . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁dz ɨ ▁ts ɨ ▁de ▁x p ɨ ny ▁Jesús ▁ziy , ▁ax ▁b d xi ch né deb ▁ir op bets te ▁de ▁b niet qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁gur ɨ d x ny ▁laad eb , ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Laat ▁n ánt ɨ ▁dec ▁de ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu , ▁r na beed eb ▁b ni ety ▁ze ct ispa c ▁ni ▁r ca az deb , ▁ne ▁de ▁ni ▁ná ▁b ɨ n roo qui , ▁run né deb ▁b ni ety ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r ca az deb ▁pur ▁gu el r na bee ▁ni ▁ráp deb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁cun ▁laat ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁gac ▁ziy , ▁sino ▁que ▁ni ▁r ca az ▁ina bee ▁lot , ▁ná ▁par ▁g ún b ɨ ▁sir v ɨ ▁lo ▁ir ate ct ɨ . </s> zab-Latn

▁Ze c qu ɨ ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁qu ɨ t ▁z eld tia ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁par ▁g ún ▁b ni ety ▁sir v ɨ ▁lua a , ▁sino ▁que ▁par ▁g úna ▁sir v ɨ ▁lod eb , ▁ne ▁cun ▁gu elg uty ▁x tena ▁qu illa ▁pur ▁de ▁x t uld ▁zi eny ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ru ▁guz ud x í ▁Jesús , ▁gur ɨ d x ny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁cia gu qui ▁ax ▁gun ab di id x ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁¿ Xi ▁r caa zt ɨ ▁g úna ▁par ▁laat ? </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ru ▁b gá ▁Jesús ▁laad eb , ▁ax ▁b gua ald ny ▁de ▁b sl od eb . ▁Ne ▁hó rac qui ▁gub íi ▁ri an lod eb ▁stu by , ▁ax ▁zen ald deb ▁Jesús . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁z edz ɨ nga x deb ▁Jerusalén , ▁nez ▁gu ɨ d x ▁ni ▁lá ▁Bet fag é ▁nez ▁nii ▁dany ▁ni ▁lá ▁Oli vos , </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ra ip ny ▁ti op ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny : ▁- ▁Gul chia ▁gu ɨ d x ▁ni ▁ná ▁del ant qu ɨ . ▁R uy ▁id xi alt ɨ ▁tu by ▁bur r ▁cá ▁yag , ▁chiy ▁cue em ▁cá ▁lli in m ɨ . ▁Gul xa ic quid em ▁ax ▁g ultan éd em . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁bela ti ▁chú u ▁ni ▁ini i ▁xi ▁ini i ▁laat , ▁ax ▁gul g ats b ɨ ▁dec ▁Dad ▁Jesús ▁g unii ▁chon énd em ▁chiy ru ▁yop sá anac n ɨ dem . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ▁guc ▁par ▁guc ▁cumplir ▁ni ▁g unii ▁tu by ▁profet ▁desde ▁gula l ▁chi ▁g uni ib : </s> zab-Latn
▁Gul ga ip y ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁r bez ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Si ón : ▁" G ul gu iaa , ▁a ▁rey ▁x tent ɨ ▁az é ed ▁rut ▁r be zt ɨ , ▁sen ciy ▁x quel ▁zé ed b ɨ ▁be ebb ɨ ▁tu by ▁bur reen ▁lli in ▁tu by ▁bur r ▁ni ▁ar uaa ▁cargu ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁gü e ▁de ▁x p ɨ ny ▁Jesús ▁ax ▁ba ande b ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Gü ené deb ▁bur r qui ▁cun ▁lli in m ɨ ▁ax ▁b zu ub deb ▁de ▁xab deb ▁dets ▁lli in m ɨ , ▁par ▁gu be eb ▁Jesús m ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁cun ▁zi eny ▁b ni ety , ▁par zi ▁nu ude b ▁gu di x deb ▁xab deb ▁lo ▁nez ▁par ▁gu de ed ▁Jesús , ▁nu uz ad eb ▁ax ▁b ti uu deb ▁de ▁ram ▁par ▁gu di x deb ▁rut ▁teed ny . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ze cl ɨ ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zan ɨ ɨ dy ▁ne ▁ze cl ɨ za ▁de ▁ni ▁zan ald ▁r b ɨ x ti ad eb : ▁- ▁¡ De ▁di id x ▁za ac ▁ná ▁par ▁Lli in ▁rey ▁David ! ▁¡ D ich os ▁ni ▁zé ed ▁pur ▁Dios ! ▁¡ X ti osten ▁X tad n ɨ ▁Dios , ▁la any ▁ni ▁r bez ny ▁lla ya baa ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bi iu ▁Jesús ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Jerusalén , ▁ir ate ▁de ▁b ɨ ngu ɨ d x qui ▁qu esenti and ▁b d xal od eb ▁ne ▁gun ab did x sa az ad eb : ▁- ▁¿ T ú ▁b niet qu ɨ ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁cua by ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zan ald ▁la any : ▁- ▁La aniy ▁profet ▁Jesús ▁ni ▁zá ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Nazaret ▁ni ▁ná ▁nez ▁Galilea . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁bii uny ▁lo ▁l d edo o ▁Jerusalén , ▁ax ▁guz ulo ▁r bé eny ▁de ▁ni ▁cat ó o ▁ne ▁de ▁ni ▁ca zii . ▁B zá ald ny ▁de ▁x m ɨ l ly ▁de ▁ni ▁r chaa ▁m ɨ ly ▁cun ▁de ▁puest ▁x te ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁r tó o ▁pal om . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁r nii : ▁" Li za ▁idi alá ▁yuu ▁rut ▁ina ab ▁b ni ety ▁lo ▁Dios . " ▁Per ▁laat ▁aba ant ɨ ni ▁ze c ▁cue v ▁x te ▁de ▁gu baan . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁cia gu ▁cun ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁co j ▁gu bi id eb ▁lo ▁Jesús ▁lani udo o qui , ▁ax ▁b sia c ny ▁laad eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁chi ▁gun á ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁cun ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley ▁de ▁milag r ɨ ▁ni ▁cay un ▁Jesús , ▁ne ▁chi ▁bind iag deb ▁r nii ▁de ▁b nini in ▁lani udo o qui : ▁"¡ De ▁di id x ▁za ac ▁ná ▁par ▁Lli in ▁rey ▁David !, " ▁chiy ▁b d xi ich deb </s> zab-Latn
▁ax ▁ra ip deb ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁¿ Ta ▁rind iag biu ▁ni ▁c anii ▁de ▁b ni iny ? ▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁R ind iag la . ▁Per ▁¿ ta ▁g ady ▁gu uld t ɨ ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁rut ▁r nii ?: ▁Ag una bee biu ▁dec ▁de ▁b nini in ▁ne ▁de ▁b doo ▁ná ▁ni ▁gu uld ▁de ▁cant ▁ni ▁iz ub yaa ▁laa biu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁b sá an ▁Jesús ▁laad eb ▁ax ▁zé ga c ny ▁Betania , ▁ru y ▁bi ian ny ▁gu xin qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bra gue el ▁sidoo ▁deni ▁z ény ▁Jerusalén ▁stu by , ▁chiy ▁guz ulo ▁r ld iaan ny . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁gun ány ▁zub ▁tu by ▁yag ▁hig ▁cue e ▁nez ▁ax ▁gü eb inu uniy , ▁per ▁p úr zi ▁bl dag ▁cá ▁lo qui . ▁Chi y ▁ra ip ny ▁yag qui : ▁- ▁¡ Aqu ɨ tru ▁chú uti ▁d xi ▁ica ▁hig ▁loo ! ▁Ax ▁hó rac qui ▁gu biz ▁yag qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁gun á ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁ziy , ▁qu esenti and ▁r d xal od eb ▁ne ▁gun ab di id x deb ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁¿ X ag uc ▁niy ▁gu bi zte ga c ▁yag ▁hig qu ɨ ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁cua by ▁Jesús ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁R gui x ti ia ▁lot , ▁bela ti ▁laat ▁rel di laa zt ɨ ▁Dios ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁gun ti op laa zt it , ▁gati ▁ni ▁baan zit ia ▁cun ▁yag qu ɨ ▁zele e ▁g ún t ɨ ▁sino ▁que ▁zele e ▁ga ipt ɨ ▁dany re : ▁" Gu bic á ▁r uc , ▁bia b ▁lo ▁nis doo , " ▁ne ▁za c ▁ziy . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ir ate ▁ni ▁ina ab t ɨ ▁lo ▁Dios , ▁bela ti ▁rel di laa zt ɨ ny , ▁la any ▁s gua ad ny ▁ni ▁ina ab t ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi g uld ▁chi ▁bi iu ▁Jesús ▁lani ud oro o ▁x te ▁Jerusalén , ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁cun ▁de ▁g urt isy ▁x te ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁Israel , ▁gü eb inuu deb ▁la any ▁ax ▁gun ab di id x deb ny : ▁- ▁¿ T ú ▁x tid x bee ▁runu ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ ? ▁¿ T ú ▁bn ɨ ɨ d x ▁li ú ▁gu el r na bee ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁cua by ▁Jesús ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁Z iy za ▁nare ▁inab di id xa ▁laat ▁tu by ▁cos . ▁Bela ti ▁ica ibt ɨ ▁chiy ru ▁ini ia ▁laat ▁tú ▁x tid x bee ▁runa ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁¿ T ú ▁b xia ald ▁Ju any ▁Ba ut ist ▁par ▁iti ub nis b ɨ ? ▁¿ Ta ▁Dios ▁b xia ald ▁laab ▁o ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu ? ▁Chi y ▁guz ulo ▁cay ue ega c deb ▁di id x ▁cun ▁saad eb , ▁ax ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁Bela ti ▁ini in ▁Dios ▁b xia ald ▁Ju any ▁Ba ut ist , ▁laab ▁sni ib ▁dun n ɨ : ▁"¿ X í nii ▁qu ɨ t ▁gü eldi laa zt ɨ b , ▁p ɨ s ?" </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁qu ɨ t za ▁xo ▁ini itin ▁dec ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁b xia ald ▁laab , ▁te ▁pur ▁r d x ib n ɨ ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁pur ▁ni ▁ir ated eb ▁rel dila az ▁dec ▁x ti id x ▁Dios ɨ y ▁g unii ▁Ju any . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip deb ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Qu ɨ t ▁gán tin . ▁Ax ▁cua by ▁Jesús ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁Z iy za ▁nare ▁qu ɨ t ▁ini itia ▁laat ▁tú ▁x tid x bee ▁runa ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁ra ip zac ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁¿ Xi ▁r ni it ▁pur ▁ni ▁ini ia ▁laat ? ▁Tub y ▁b ni ety ▁guu ▁ti op ▁ll inga an b ɨ , ▁chiy ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁tu by ▁de ▁lli in b ɨ qui : ▁" L li inia , ▁and xir é ▁gü ega any ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁lo ▁rut ▁nuu ▁uv . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁cua by ▁lli in b ɨ : ▁"¡ Qu ɨ t ▁chá atia !" ▁Per ▁chig uld ▁ax ▁b chu ▁lli in b ɨ qui ▁x gab , ▁ax ▁gü eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁b niet qui ▁gü eg ats b ɨ ▁stu by ▁lli in b ɨ ▁chia , ▁chiy ▁cua by ▁lli in b ɨ qui : ▁" G ü én , ▁naga zi ▁chá a . " ▁Per ▁qu ɨ t ▁gü et ib . </s> zab-Latn
▁An re ▁gul nii ▁nare : ▁¿ T ú ▁de ▁lo ▁ir op deb ▁ba any ▁ni ▁r ca az ▁x t adde b ▁g ún deb ? ▁Chi y ▁cua ib deb ▁lo ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Lli in b ɨ ▁ni ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁g ulo te . ▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁N are ▁r gui x ti ia ▁lot ▁dec ▁de ▁ni ▁run ▁cob r ɨ ▁impu est ▁par ▁Roma , ▁ne ▁de ▁guna a ▁ni ▁nab ány d xab , ▁n ido ol deb ▁yii ude b ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ▁que ▁laat . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁be ed ▁Ju any ▁Ba ut ist ▁par ▁ili u ub ▁laat ▁xa ▁ri ál d ▁ib ány t ɨ , ▁per ▁qu ɨ t ▁gü eldi laa zt it ▁x ti id x b ɨ . ▁Ne ▁de ▁ni ▁run ▁cob r ɨ ▁x te ▁impu est ▁ziy za ▁de ▁guna a ▁ni ▁nab ány d xab ▁gü el dila az deb ▁x ti id x ▁Ju any . ▁Per ▁laat ▁mas qu ɨ ▁gun át ▁ir ate ▁de ▁cos qui , ▁qu ɨ t ▁b ch utit ▁x gab t ɨ ▁par ▁ni aldi laa zt ɨ ▁x ti id x b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁' An re ▁gul cu adia g ▁stu by ▁cu end ▁ni ▁ini ia ▁laat ▁- ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb ▁- ▁. ▁G uu ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁bz ub ▁de ▁yag ▁uv ▁lo ▁lli ab , ▁chiy ▁ba ania c b ɨ ▁gur r aly ▁idu ib rd onte c . ▁Chi y ru ▁ban chuu zac b ɨ ▁lá ani ▁rut ▁il lii ▁qu ia ▁de ▁uv qui , ▁ne ▁b zu ub zac b ɨ ▁tu by ▁yuu ▁yaa ▁par ▁ya ap ▁idu ib te ▁lo ▁lli ab qui . ▁' C hiy ru ▁gu ledi in b ɨ ni ▁lo ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁nán ▁run ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁x te ▁uv ▁ax ▁zé ga c b ɨ , ▁zit ▁nez ▁rut ▁gü elde z b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁ni ▁gac ▁ir uld ▁uv , ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁tu by ▁ti op ▁de ▁x mos b ɨ ▁par ▁ch alli id eb ▁ni ▁ri ál db ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁run ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁lo ▁liu qui , ▁guna az deb ▁de ▁mos qui . ▁Tub y ▁mos qui ▁b taa z deb , ▁stu by b ɨ ▁gud inx ú deb , ▁chiy ▁stu by b ɨ ▁ax ▁b cua ad eb ▁guia ▁laab . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁x tenni ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui ▁gub íi ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁zien ru ▁de ▁mos , ▁per ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁zi yti zia c ▁bann é deb ▁de ▁mos qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁' C hiy ru ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁ll inga an b ɨ , ▁te ▁pur ▁baan b ɨ ▁x gab , ▁g uni ib : ▁" Z appa c deb ▁did x doo ▁lli inia . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁chi ▁gun á ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁ll inga an b ɨ , ▁ax ▁ra ip deb ▁saad eb : ▁" B niet qu ɨ y ▁ná ▁ni ▁y anné ▁liu ▁rut ▁nuu ▁uv qu ɨ . ▁Gul too ▁idin x ún b ɨ ▁te ▁ga cni ▁x ten n ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ▁x quel ▁guc , ▁guna az deb ▁laab ▁ax ▁gul é ed eb ▁laab ▁lo ▁liu qui ▁chiy ▁gud inx ú deb ▁laab . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁gun ab di id x ny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁can in ény : ▁- ▁An re ▁chi ▁gue ed ▁ni ▁ná ▁x tenni ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui , ▁¿ xi ▁r lil ot ▁gun né b ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁cua ib deb ▁lo ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁S gu inx ú b ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁ig á tib ▁laad eb , ▁chiy ru ▁cu ed ín b ɨ ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui ▁lo ▁stu by ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ide ed ▁laab ▁ni ▁ri ál db ɨ ▁chi ▁a ▁ná ▁par ▁gac ▁ir uld ▁uv . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip za ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁¿ Ta ▁g ady ▁chú u ▁chi ▁gu uld t ɨ ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ? ▁rut ▁r nii : ▁Gu ia ▁ni ▁al di ▁gu legu un ▁de ▁ni ▁rzu ub ▁yuu , ▁guia qui ▁ná ▁ni ▁maz ru ▁bl li ú ▁par ▁guz ub ▁yuu qui . ▁Niy ▁ná ▁ni ▁ba any ▁Dios ▁ax ▁qu esenti and ▁r d x alon . </s> zab-Latn
▁Pur ▁ning ui ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁dec ▁s bic át ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ▁ax ▁ir ɨ n qu ɨ ▁de ▁ni ▁yii u ▁x latt ɨ , ▁de ▁ni ▁guld í pac ▁g ún ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r ca az ny . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁ziy za ▁tu tix ▁ni ▁l dap ▁guia qui , ▁laab ▁s de ed b ɨ ▁gu el zii . ▁Per ▁bela ti ▁guia qui ▁yab ni ▁qu ia ▁b ni ety ▁ax ▁s nit lo tec ni ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn

▁- ▁Gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ▁ná ▁ze c ▁tu by ▁rey ▁ni ▁ba any ▁tu by ▁saa ▁chi ▁bi ch naa ▁lli in b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁de ▁x mos b ɨ ▁par ▁gü et ɨ d x deb ▁de ▁bio os , ▁per ▁de ▁bio os qui ▁qu ɨ t ▁niz igu eld ti deb ▁ni ad eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁gub íi ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁stu by ▁de ▁x mos b ɨ , ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁laad eb : ▁" G ul g ats ▁de ▁bio os qui ▁ag ü ele e ▁com id , ▁dec ▁guna bi ia ▁gut y ▁de ▁g ú un ▁x tena ▁ne ▁de ▁lad xaa ▁ni ▁maz ru ▁ndi io ▁ax ▁ir ate ▁ag ü ele e , ▁gul g ats deb ▁gue ed deb ▁saa . " </s> zab-Latn

▁' Per ▁chi ▁bi iu ▁rey qui ▁par ▁gü egu ia ab ▁lo ▁de ▁bio os , ▁chiy ▁gun áb ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁na cuti ▁lady ▁x te ▁saa . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁b niet qui : ▁" X mig uaa , ▁¿ xa ▁ba aniu ▁bi iu ▁rur é ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t ▁na cu tiu ▁lady ▁x te ▁saa ?" ▁Chi y ▁qu ɨ t ▁xi ▁cua ib ti ▁b niet qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁rey qui ▁de ▁ni ▁cag ui izy : ▁" G ul di iby ▁de ▁naab ▁ne ▁de ▁ni ib ▁ax ▁gul zá ald b ɨ ▁rut ▁na cay ▁nez ▁dets qu ɨ , ▁rut ▁gu un b ɨ ▁ne ▁gola ib ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn

▁Ax ▁b xia ald deb ▁de ▁x p ɨ n deb ▁cun ▁de ▁x p ɨ ny ▁Herodes ▁par ▁cha ga ip deb ▁la any : ▁- ▁Ma istr ɨ , ▁dun n ɨ ▁nán n ɨ ▁dec ▁laa biu ▁rue ebi u ▁did x ld í , ▁ne ▁guld í pac biu ▁r li uu biu ▁xa ▁x quel ▁r ca az ▁Dios ▁ib ány ▁b ni ety , ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁run ti biu ▁cu end ▁tú ▁ná ▁b ni ety . ▁Te ▁pur ▁nez ▁lo biu ▁tu by lo te ▁ná ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁An re ▁g uni ibi u ▁dun n ɨ : ▁¿ Ta ▁ná ▁gü en ▁id ill yn ɨ ▁x te ▁impu est ▁lo ▁rey ▁César , ▁o ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁gü en ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁guc be ega c ny ▁de ▁mal ▁x gab ▁x tende b , ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁B ɨ ndi x úd eni , ▁¿ x í nii ▁runt ɨ ▁prueb ▁nare ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Gul ▁li uu ▁nare ▁tu by ▁m ɨ ly ▁ni ▁r gu ill yt ɨ ▁x te ▁impu est . ▁Chi y ru ▁bed né deb ▁tu by ▁m ɨ ly ▁den ari , </s> zab-Latn

▁La ad eb ▁cua ib deb : ▁- ▁X te ▁rey ▁César . ▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Gul de ed ▁César ▁ni ▁ná ▁x te ▁César , ▁ne ▁gul de ed ▁Dios ▁ni ▁ná ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn

▁R caa zt ɨ ▁ili u ut ▁b ni ety ▁ne ▁ni cl ɨ ▁laat ▁qu ɨ t ▁g ánt ɨ , ▁ax ▁r cu alot ▁qu ɨ t ▁g ún t ɨ ▁de ▁cos ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁cu enzi ▁ná ti ▁d uld , ▁per ▁qu ɨ t ▁runt it ▁x gab ▁pur ▁de ▁d uld roo ▁ni ▁runt ɨ . ▁Na ▁x ti id x ▁b ni ety : ▁¡ X í pal za ▁r cu alot ▁qu ɨ t ▁ga ibt ɨ ▁beg u eg , ▁ne ▁ra bia ct ɨ ▁came y ! </s> zab-Latn

▁Z iy za ▁g unii ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁¡ De ▁b ɨ ny ▁Jerusalén , ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁Jerusalén , ▁laat ▁r gu inx út ▁de ▁profet ▁ne ▁r cua at ▁guia ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zé ed ▁pur ▁Dios ! ▁¡ Zi enzi ▁gü elt ▁b caa za ▁nich asaa ▁laat ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r ch asaa ▁b ɨ dy ▁de ▁lli in m ɨ ▁lá ani ▁xi ilm ɨ , ▁per ▁qu ɨ t ▁ni ▁n át it ! </s> zab-Latn

▁Ne ▁r nii za ca ▁laat ▁dec ▁desde ▁an re ▁aqu ɨ tru ▁ini át it ▁nare ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁chi ▁id z ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁ni ▁ini it : ▁" D ich os ▁ni ▁zé ed ▁pur ▁X tad n ɨ ▁Dios . " </s> zab-Latn
▁D eni ▁b di ia ▁Jesús ▁lani ud oro o ▁x te ▁Jerusalén ▁par ▁az ény , ▁chiy ▁gü ena ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁la any , ▁r li uu deb ny ▁ir aru ▁de ▁yuu ▁x te ▁yudo o qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁R gui x ti ia ▁lot ▁dec ▁ir ate ▁ni ▁c agu ia at qu ɨ , ▁ter u ▁chú u ▁d xi ▁ni cl ɨ ▁tu by ▁guia ▁qu ɨ t ▁yá anti ▁qu ia ▁stu by ni , ▁ir at eni ▁ib ily . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁gü ed eb ▁qu ia ▁dany ▁ni ▁lá ▁Oli vos . ▁Chi y ▁deni ▁guri ▁Jesús ▁ru y , ▁ax ▁gü eb inuu ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁la any ▁par ▁gun ab di id x deb ny : ▁- ▁R caa zn ɨ ▁ini ibi u ▁dun n ɨ ▁g úc ▁gac ▁ziy . ▁Ne , ▁¿ xa ▁ná ▁ni ▁gac ▁seny ▁dec ▁ague ed biu ▁stu by , ▁ne ▁dec ▁amer za ▁l d ull ▁gu ɨ ch liu ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁Gul cu alo ▁qu ɨ t ▁tu ▁g ún ▁eng any ▁laat . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁zi enzi ▁ni ▁gue ed ▁ini i ▁dec ▁pur ▁nare ▁zé ed deb . ▁Chi y ▁ini id eb ▁laat : ▁" N are ▁naa ▁Crist , " ▁ax ▁zi enzi ▁b ni ety ▁g ún deb ▁eng any . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁laat ▁chi ▁gu ind ia gt ɨ ▁caya c ▁gu err ▁o ▁dec ▁riat za ▁di id x ▁gac ▁gu err , ▁qu ɨ t ▁id x ib tit ▁te ▁pur ▁ziy ▁ná ▁par ▁gac . ▁Per ▁gati ▁pur ▁zi yti ▁l d ull ▁gu ɨ ch liu . </s> zab-Latn

▁Z iy za ▁s dia cá ▁zi eny ▁de ▁profet ▁ni ▁gü ee ▁dix ú , ▁ax ▁zi enzi ▁b ni ety ▁g ún deb ▁eng any . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁de ▁tant ▁de ▁mal ▁ni ▁gac qui ▁casi ▁ir ate ▁b ni ety ▁aqu ɨ tru ▁ica az ti deb ▁de ▁saad eb . </s> zab-Latn

" </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Qu esenti and ▁na las ▁r zii enia . ▁A zu pa cza ▁aqu inx ú ▁gu elna las qu ɨ ▁naa . ▁G uly áan ▁rur én ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t ▁gaa istit . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ru ▁gü eny ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny , ▁ax ▁b d xi al ny ▁laad eb ▁raa is deb , ▁chiy ▁ra ip ny ▁Bed : ▁- ▁¿ Ta ▁ni cl ɨ ▁tu by ▁hor ▁qu ɨ t ▁nia lee ▁nit ɨ ɨ cht ɨ ▁x ca ald t ɨ ▁par ▁zugu an ét ▁nare ? </s> zab-Latn

▁Ni ▁r rop ▁gü elt ▁gü ena ab ny ▁lo ▁Dios , ▁la any ▁g uni iny : ▁- ▁X tada , ▁bela ti ▁qu ɨ t ▁xo ▁teed ▁gu el zii ▁ni ▁ná ▁par ▁teda , ▁bela ti ▁ná pac ▁par ▁teda ▁gu el zii qui , ▁su ▁cha ga c ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r ca az biu ▁gac . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bie c qu iny ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny , ▁ade b ▁raa isia c ▁stu by , ▁pur ▁ni ▁caz inaa ▁b ca ald ▁laad eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁b sá an ny ▁laad eb ▁par ▁z ena ab ny ▁lo ▁Dios ▁ni ▁ri on ▁gü elt ▁cun ▁laga c ▁de ▁di id x qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bie c qu iny ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny , ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁¿ Ta ▁ze c zi ▁raa ist ɨ ? ▁¿ Ta ▁ze c zi ▁ca zi laa zt ɨ ? ▁Per ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios , ▁ab dz ɨ ny ▁hor ▁ni ▁ga ca ▁ent ria gu ▁la zna a ▁de ▁b ɨ nd uld . </s> zab-Latn
▁Gul chas te . ▁Gul too . ▁Gul gu iaa , ▁a ▁ni ▁g ún ▁ent ria gu ▁nare ▁az ed dz ɨ nga x . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ze c zi ▁can iné ▁Jesús ▁laad eb ▁chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁Judas ▁ni ▁ra cza ▁tu by ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny . ▁B dz ɨ n né b ▁zi engu illi ú ▁b ɨ ny , ▁ca ad eb ▁spad ▁ne ▁yag . ▁Z ena az deb ▁Jesús ▁pur ▁x ti id x ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ne ▁pur ▁x ti id x za ▁de ▁g urt isy ▁x te ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁Israel . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁cun ▁Judas ▁ni ▁ba any ▁ent ria gu ▁la any ▁ag udi xte et ell gab ▁lo ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui , ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁laad eb : ▁" B ni ety ▁ni ▁gag ua ▁tu by ▁x mos ni , ▁laab ɨ y ▁r gu í il yt ɨ ▁ax ▁gul na az b ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Par zi ▁chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁Judas , ▁ax ▁gü eb inu ub ▁Jesús ▁chiy ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁la any : ▁- ▁¡ Z ac gu xin biu , ▁Ma istr ɨ ! ▁As ▁gud ob ▁ru uny . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁X mig uaa , ▁ba any ▁ni ▁z ed ga aniu . ▁Ax ▁gu bii ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁guna az deb ▁Jesús ▁par ▁chan é deb ny . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁Gulu chuu ▁spad qu ɨ ▁x lat ni . ▁Te ▁pur ▁ni ▁r dil dy ▁cun ▁spad , ▁cun ▁sp adza ▁rat yb ɨ . </s> zab-Latn

▁Per ▁chiy , ▁¿ xo ▁gac ▁cumplir ▁ze c ▁ni ▁cá ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios , ▁ne ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁r nii ▁dec ▁ná ▁par ▁gac ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ac aya c ▁an re ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁zé edt ɨ ▁cun ▁spad ▁ne ▁cun ▁yag ▁par ▁chan ét ▁nare ▁ze c pa cza ▁tu by ▁gu baan ? ▁L lil lite ▁guz ugu an ía ▁laat ▁lani ud oro o ▁x te ▁Jerusalén ▁case eda ▁laat ▁x ti id x ▁Dios , ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t ▁n inaa zt ɨ ▁nare . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁ir ate ▁de ▁cos ré ▁caya cni ▁par ▁gac ▁cumplir ▁ze c ▁ni ▁g unii ▁de ▁profet ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios . ▁Hor qui ▁bl lu u in ▁de ▁x p ɨ ny ▁Jesús , ▁gu lela az ga c deb ▁la any . </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁guna az ▁Jesús ▁gü ené deb ny ▁liz ▁Cai f ás , ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z , ▁chiy ▁ru y ▁d x asaa ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley ▁cun ▁de ▁g urt isy ▁x te ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁Israel . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁Bed ▁zit , ▁zit ▁gü en ald b ɨ ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁lo ▁l dee ▁liz ▁b xo z qui . ▁Chi ▁bii ub , ▁ax ▁gur in éb ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁ca cu alo ▁liz ▁b xo z qui ▁par ▁í gu ia ab ▁xi ▁gun né ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁Jesús . </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁cun ▁ir ate ▁de ▁g urt isy ▁gud í ily deb ▁xi ▁dix ú ▁ic ua qui ad eb ▁Jesús ▁par ▁cha lee ▁chú u ▁nez ▁quin xú deb ny . </s> zab-Latn

▁ax ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁B niet qu ɨ ▁g uni ib : ▁" N are ▁zele e ▁its ɨ lia ▁yudo o ▁x te ▁Dios , ▁ne ▁cun ▁chon ▁d xi ▁ag ub íi ▁b zu ubani ▁stu by . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁gü es uld í ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z , ▁ax ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁qu ɨ t ▁xi ▁r ni iti u ? ▁¿ Ta ▁did x ld í ▁ná ▁ni ▁cani id eb ▁pur ▁li ú ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁qu ɨ t ▁xi ▁cua ibt iny . ▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁b xo z qui ▁la any : ▁- ▁Pur ▁Dios ▁ni ▁r bez ▁nab ány , ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁li ú ▁g unii ▁dun n ɨ ▁did x ld í , ▁¿ ta ▁li ú y ▁Crist ▁Lli in ▁Dios ? </s> zab-Latn

▁r ni ig ad eb : ▁- ▁Li ú ▁ni ▁g uni iu ▁its ɨ liu ▁y ud oro o ▁x te ▁Jerusalén ▁chiy ▁cun ▁chon ▁d xi ▁ab zu ub uni ▁stu by , ▁an re ▁b ldá ▁li ú . ▁Bela ti ▁li ú y ▁Lli in ▁Dios , ▁bi at ▁lo ▁cru zy qu ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ti zia c ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁cun ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley ▁ne ▁de ▁g urt isy ▁x te ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁Israel , ▁ba ande b ▁bur l ɨ ▁Jesús , ▁laad eb ▁g uni id eb : </s> zab-Latn
▁- ▁Gü ele e ▁guc né b ▁stu by ▁de ▁b ni ety , ▁per ▁qu ɨ t ▁xo ▁í ld atib ▁laga c ▁laab . ▁Bela ti ▁laab ɨ y ▁Rey ▁x te ▁Israel , ▁su ▁yi at b ɨ ▁lo ▁cru zy ▁te ▁chol di laa zn ɨ b . </s> zab-Latn
▁La ab ▁rel dila az b ɨ ▁Dios , ▁an re ▁su ▁í lda ▁Dios ▁laab ▁bela ti ▁r ca az ny ▁laab , ▁ady ▁r ni ib : ▁" N are ▁naa ▁Lli in ▁Dios . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁a xt ▁de ▁gu baan ▁ni ▁cá ▁lo ▁cru zy ▁cun ▁la any ▁ba any ▁bur l ɨ ▁la any . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁guc ▁laid xi , ▁chiy ▁idu ib te ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁b cay , ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁r ca ▁chon ▁gud xi . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁r ca ▁chon qui ▁gur ɨ x tia ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁El í , ▁El í , ▁¿ lama ▁saba ct ani ? ▁- ▁zelo ▁di id x qui : ▁Dios ▁mío , ▁Dios ▁mío , ▁¿ x í nii ▁gu lela az biu ▁nare ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁tu by ▁ti op ▁de ▁ni ▁zug uaa ▁ru y ▁ziy , ▁ax ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁Ab cab ɨ d x ▁profet ▁El ías . </s> zab-Latn
▁As ▁bl lu u in ▁tu by deb ▁par ▁gü egu ad x b ɨ ▁tu by ▁sp onj ▁lo ▁vin agr ɨ . ▁Chi y ▁b cua ab ▁sp onj qui ▁qu ia ▁tu by ▁yag ▁par ▁b cua ab ▁sp onj qui ▁ru uny . </s> zab-Latn

▁ax ▁bl lal ▁ruu ▁de ▁baa . ▁Ne ▁zi eny ▁de ▁x p ɨ ny ▁Dios ▁gub íi ▁gub ány deb ▁stu by . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁chi ▁gub íi ▁gub ány ▁Jesús ▁stu by , ▁ax ▁b dii ad eb ▁lá ani ▁baa ▁x tende b , ▁chiy ▁bii ude b ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Jerusalén ▁rut ▁gun á ▁zi eny ▁b ni ety ▁laad eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁capitán ▁cun ▁ir aru ▁de ▁s uld ad ▁ni ▁ca cu alo ▁Jesús , ▁chi ▁gun á deb ▁caya c ▁llu ▁cun ▁ir at eru ▁de ▁ni ▁caya c qui , ▁qu esenti and ▁b d x ib deb ▁ax ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁Did x ld í ca za qu ɨ y ▁Lli in ▁Dios ▁b niet qu ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁zi eny ▁de ▁guna a ▁ni ▁gu zan ald ▁Jesús ▁desde ▁Galilea ▁par ▁guc né deb ny , ▁zug ua ad eb ▁ru y ▁des d ɨ ▁zit ▁c agu ia ad eb ▁ni ▁caya c . </s> zab-Latn

▁ra ip deb ▁laab : ▁- ▁Dad , ▁dun n ɨ ▁rene laa zn ɨ ▁dec ▁chi ▁gub ány ▁b ɨ ndi xú qui ▁g uni ib ▁dec ▁chi ▁gac ▁chon ▁d xi ▁s bí i ▁ib ány b ɨ ▁stu by . </s> zab-Latn
▁Pur ▁ning ui , ▁guna bee biu ▁cha cu al od eb ▁ruu ▁baa qui ▁a xt ▁chi ▁yalo ▁chon ▁d xi qui ▁te ▁qu ɨ t ▁gun ▁gue ed ▁de ▁x p ɨ nb ɨ ▁gu xin ▁par ▁gu edl da ande b ▁x cuer p ɨ b , ▁ax ▁ga ip deb ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁dec ▁ag ub ány b ɨ ▁stu by . ▁Ne ▁bela ti ▁g ún deb ▁ziy , ▁ax ▁maz rul ▁g uro o ▁dix ú qui ▁que ▁dix ú ▁ni ▁guu ▁g ulo qui . </s> zab-Latn

▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁ri uté biu ▁cun ▁dun n ɨ , ▁Jesús ▁de ▁Nazaret ? ▁¿ Ta ▁zé ed biu ▁par ▁init lo biu ▁dun n ɨ ? ▁Per ▁nare ▁r umbi ia ▁laa biu , ▁ne ▁nán na ▁dec ▁laa biu ▁ná biu ▁B ni ety ▁sant ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn

▁Ir ate ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zug uaa ▁ru y ▁r d xal od eb ▁ne ▁r nab did x sa az ad eb : ▁- ▁¿ Xi ▁cos qu ɨ ▁ning ui ▁la any ▁ir ɨ n qu ɨ ▁cali u uny ▁dun n ɨ ? ▁Ne , ▁¡ ques enti andza ▁nap ny ▁gu el r na bee , ▁a xt ▁de ▁b ɨ nd xab ▁r cu adia g ▁x ti id x ny ! </s> zab-Latn

▁Per ▁x n ansu egr ɨ ▁Sim óny ▁ná ga ab ▁rac xú b . ▁Nu ub ▁x lia a . ▁Chi y ▁gu di xte ed eb ▁lo ▁Jesús ▁dec ▁laab ▁rac xú b . </s> zab-Latn

▁Per ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁r nii ▁di id x ▁mal ▁contr ɨ ▁Sp íritu ▁Sant , ▁qu ɨ t ▁chú uti ▁d xi ▁gap b ɨ ▁perd ón ▁sino ▁que ▁ab nit b ɨ ▁lo ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn

▁Jesús ▁gub íi ▁case ed ny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ruu ▁nis ▁x te ▁Galilea . ▁Ne ▁cun ▁b ni ety ▁gu illi ú ▁b d x asaa ▁rut ▁zug ua any ▁ax ▁bie ep ny ▁lá ani ▁tu by ▁bar cu ▁ni ▁nuu ▁lo ▁nis qui , ▁chiy ▁gur iny ▁lá an qui ▁lal zi ▁ni ▁zug uaa ▁ir ate ▁de ▁b niet qui ▁ruu ▁nis qui . </s> zab-Latn

▁- ▁Gul cu adia g ▁ni ▁ini ia ▁laat . ▁G uu ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁gü ec ua ab ▁biny ▁lo ▁lli ab . </s> zab-Latn

▁Jesús ▁ax ▁ra ip y ▁laab : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁r ni iu ▁dec ▁gü en ▁naa ? ▁Qu ɨ tru ▁tu ▁ná ti ▁gü en , ▁qu es ol tis y ▁Dios ▁ná ▁gü en . </s> zab-Latn
▁Li ú ▁an án nu ▁de ▁mand ami ent : ▁" Qu ɨ t ▁quin xú tiu ▁b ni ety . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁gapu ▁stu by ▁guna a . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁ga ctiu ▁gu baan . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁gü e eti u ▁dix ú ▁pur ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni cl ɨ za ▁qu ɨ t ▁g ún tiu ▁eng any . ▁G úp ▁did x doo ▁x t adu ▁ne ▁x n anu . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁cua by ▁b niet qui : ▁- ▁Ma istr ɨ , ▁ir ate ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ ▁cay una ▁desde ▁chi ▁naa ▁bi chi in . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁b gu ia any ▁lob , ▁b ca az ny ▁laab ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laab : ▁- ▁Per ▁rie ed x ▁g ú nu ▁stu by ▁cos : ▁Qu eg ü et ó o ▁ir ate ▁de ▁ni ▁napu ▁chiy ▁b de ed ▁m ɨ ly qui ▁de ▁prob , ▁te ▁ziy ▁x quel ▁gapu ▁gu elna za ac ▁lla ya baa . ▁Chi y ru ▁qued an ald ▁nare ▁mas qu ɨ ▁ni ▁teed ti ziu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁b niet qui ▁ziy , ▁r nia ▁gu zac b ɨ ▁ax ▁qu esenti and ▁na las ▁zé ga c b ɨ ▁te ▁pur ▁la ▁ric u ▁ná b . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁b gu iaa ▁Jesús ▁lo ▁ir ated eb ▁ne ▁ra ip ny ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny : ▁- ▁¡ X í pal za ▁nag án ▁par ▁yii u ▁de ▁ric u ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ! </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁r d xal od eb ▁pur ▁de ▁x ti id x ny . ▁Per ▁Jesús ▁gub íi ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁De ▁lli inia , ▁tu by ▁ni ▁z enela az ▁de ▁xix tenni , ▁¡ nag án qu ɨ za ▁par ▁yii ub ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Maz ru ▁sen ciy ▁teed ▁tu by ▁came y ▁gu ɨ ɨ dy ▁x te ▁tu by ▁gu ɨ ch g ull ▁que ▁par ▁yii u ▁tu by ▁ric u ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag deb ▁de ▁di id x ré , ▁qu esenti and ▁r d xal od eb ▁ne ▁guz ulo ▁r nab did x sa ad eb : ▁- ▁¿ T ú lesa ▁cha lee ▁gac ▁perd ón ▁lo ▁Dios ▁pur ▁de ▁x t uld ni ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁b gu ia any ▁lod eb ▁ax ▁g uni iny : ▁- ▁Par ▁b ni ety ▁nag án , ▁per ▁gati ▁par ▁Dios ti , ▁te ▁pur ▁la any ▁x íte ete ▁nag án ti ▁par ▁la any . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁Bed ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁D unn ɨ ▁abs á ann ɨ ▁ir ate ▁ni ▁r d x ap n ɨ ▁par ▁zi op n ald n ɨ ▁laa biu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁R gui x ti ia ▁lot ▁dec ▁tu tix ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁r bela az ▁li zni , ▁de ▁bets ni , ▁de ▁b za anni , ▁x tad ni , ▁x nan ni , ▁chi alni , ▁de ▁lli inni , ▁o ▁de ▁li uza ▁x tenni ▁pur ▁nare ▁ne ▁pur ▁de ▁did x za ac ▁x te ▁Dios , </s> zab-Latn
▁laab ▁sca ab ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch li uré ▁tu by ▁gay uaa ▁maz ru ▁que ▁de ▁ni ▁abs áan b ɨ : ▁bel ▁de ▁liz b ɨ , ▁o ▁de ▁bets b ɨ , ▁o ▁de ▁b za an b ɨ , ▁o ▁x nan b ɨ , ▁o ▁de ▁lli in b ɨ , ▁o ▁de ▁li uza ▁x ten b ɨ , ▁mas qu ɨ ▁cun ▁gu el zii ▁per ▁sca ab ni . ▁Chi y ▁lla ya baa ▁zap b ɨ ▁gu el nab ány ▁par ▁cha zy . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁zi enzi ▁de ▁ni ▁ná ▁primer ▁an re , ▁gac ▁l últ m ɨ , ▁ne ▁de ▁ni ▁ná ▁l últ m ɨ ▁an re , ▁gac ▁primer ▁chiy . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁zé deb ▁par ▁Jerusalén , ▁Jesús ▁zan ɨ ɨ d ny ▁lo ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁ax ▁r d xal od eb ▁z ény ▁Jerusalén , ▁per ▁ir aru ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zan ald ▁la any ▁ax ▁r d x ib deb . ▁Chi y ▁gur ɨ d x ny ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁tu by ▁lad , ▁guz ulo ▁r gui xte eny ▁lod eb ▁xa ▁x quel ▁teed ny . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Laat ▁n ánt ɨ ▁dec ▁azo on ▁Jerusalén , ▁ru y ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁za ca ▁ent ria gu ▁lo ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁lo ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ne ▁lo ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley . ▁Chi y ▁laad eb ▁ina beed eb ▁gat ia , ▁z undeb ▁ent ria gu ▁nare ▁lo ▁de ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná ▁b ni ety ▁Israel . </s> zab-Latn
▁La ad eb ▁ax ▁g ún deb ▁bur l ɨ ▁naa , ▁sta az deb ▁naa , ▁sti ux ɨ ́ n deb ▁lua a ▁ne ▁sgu inx ú deb ▁nare . ▁Per ▁ni ▁ri on ▁d xi , ▁s bí i ▁ib án ia ▁stu by . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁Jacob ▁cun ▁Ju any ▁de ▁ll inga an ▁Zeb ede o ▁gu biga x deb ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁Jesús , ▁ra ip deb ▁la any : ▁- ▁Ma istr ɨ , ▁r caa zn ɨ ▁g ún biu ▁tu by ▁favor ▁ni ▁ini in ▁laa biu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁gun ab di id x ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁¿ Xi ▁r caa zt ɨ ▁g úna ? </s> zab-Latn
▁La ad eb ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁R caa zn ɨ ▁dec ▁chi ▁ac ana bee biu , ▁chiy ▁iz ub n ɨ ▁cue ebi u , ▁tu by ▁ni ▁cue ▁lad ▁n ald í ▁stu by ▁ni ▁cue ▁lad ▁r bes . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Nic l ɨ ▁qu ɨ t ▁g ánt ɨ ▁xing ▁r na ab t ɨ . ▁¿ T atix ▁zele e ▁te edt ɨ ▁gu el zii ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ná ▁par ▁teda ? ▁¿ T atix ▁zele e ▁gat yt ɨ ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ná ▁par ▁gat ia ? </s> zab-Latn
▁La ad eb ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁Z ele ela . ▁Chi y ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Did x ld í qu ɨ y ▁s de edt ɨ ▁gu el zii ▁ze c ▁nare ▁ne ▁zat yza ct ɨ ▁ze c ▁nare . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁ni ▁cu et ▁lad ▁n ald í ▁o ▁lad ▁r bes za ▁x tena , ▁gati ▁nar etia ▁ri ál d ▁in ɨ ɨ d xani ▁laat , ▁te ▁pur ▁la ani ▁a ▁ná ni ▁par ▁de ▁ni ▁ri ál d ni . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁dz ɨ ▁ts ɨ ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁ziy , ▁b d xi ch né deb ▁Ju any ▁cun ▁Jacob . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁gur ɨ d x ny ▁laad eb , ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Laat ▁n ánt ɨ ▁dec ▁de ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu , ▁r na beed eb ▁b ni ety ▁ze ct ispa c ▁ni ▁r ca az deb , ▁ne ▁de ▁ni ▁ná ▁b ɨ n roo qui , ▁run né deb ▁b ni ety ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r ca az deb ▁pur ▁gu el r na bee ▁ni ▁ráp deb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁cun ▁laat ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁gac ▁ziy , ▁sino ▁que ▁ni ▁r ca az ▁ina bee ▁lot , ▁ná ▁par ▁g ún b ɨ ▁sir v ɨ ▁lo ▁ir ate ct ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁ni ▁r ca az ▁gac ▁ni ▁maz rupa c ▁sac ▁lot , ▁ná ▁par ▁gac b ɨ ▁mos ▁lo ▁ir ate ct ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁ni cl ɨ ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios , ▁qu ɨ t ▁z eld tia ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁par ▁g ún ▁b ni ety ▁sir v ɨ ▁lua a ▁sino ▁que ▁par ▁g úna ▁sir v ɨ ▁lod eb , ▁ne ▁cun ▁gu elg uty ▁x tena ▁qu illa ▁pur ▁de ▁x t uld ▁zi enzi ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ n deb ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Jer ic ó , ▁deni ▁zedi ia ▁Jesús ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x qui ▁cun ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁ne ▁cun ru ▁zi enzi ▁de ▁b ni ety , ▁chiy ▁guu ▁tu by ▁cia gu ▁lá ▁Bar time o , ▁ll inga an ▁Time o . ▁Z ub b ɨ ▁cue e ▁nez ▁r gui in b ɨ ▁gun . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁guc be eb ▁z edz ɨ nga x ▁Jesús ▁de ▁Nazaret , ▁ax ▁guz ulo ▁r b ɨ x ti ab : ▁- ▁¡ Jes ús , ▁Ll inga an ▁David , ▁b gá biu ▁nare ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Zi eny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁r d ild né ▁laab ▁par ▁ig any b ɨ , ▁per ▁laab ▁maz rul ▁r b ɨ x ti ab : ▁- ▁¡ L linga an ▁David , ▁blas la az biu ▁nare ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁guz ud x í ▁Jesús , ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁G ult ɨ d x b ɨ . ▁Chi y ▁gur ɨ d x deb ▁cia gu qui , ▁ra ip deb ▁laab : ▁- ▁Gu za cla az . ▁Gü es uld í , ▁cab ɨ d x ny ▁li ú . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁b zá alda c b ɨ ▁xab gui ch b ɨ , ▁a xt pa cza ▁r tes b ɨ ▁gü es uld í b ▁gü eb inu ub ▁Jesús . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ax ▁gun ab di id x ny ▁laab : ▁- ▁¿ Xi ▁r caa zu ▁g úna ▁pur ▁li ú ? ▁Cia gu qui ▁cua ib b ɨ : ▁- ▁Ma istr ɨ , ▁nare ▁r caa za ▁ib íi ▁yi an l uaa ▁stu by . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ra ip ny ▁laab : ▁- ▁A ze lee ▁ch uu . ▁Ab ia cu ▁pur ▁gu el rel dila az ▁x ten u . ▁Hó rac qui ▁ag ü ele e ▁gub íi ▁bian lo ▁b niet qui ▁ax ▁zen alda c b ɨ ▁Jesús ▁nez qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁z edz ɨ nga x deb ▁par ▁Jerusalén ▁nez ▁rut ▁ná ▁de ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Bet fag é ▁cun ▁Betania ▁nez ▁nii ▁dany ▁ni ▁lá ▁Oli vos , ▁Jesús ▁b xia ald ny ▁ti op ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny , </s> zab-Latn
▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Gul chia ▁gu ɨ d x ▁ni ▁ná ▁del ant qu ɨ . ▁Chi ▁id z ɨ nt ɨ ▁ru y , ▁id xi alt ɨ ▁tu by ▁bur reen ▁ni ▁cá ▁yag ▁ne ▁rute ete ▁g ady ▁tu ▁cue eb ti ▁la am , ▁ax ▁gul xa ic quim ɨ ▁chiy ▁g ultan ém . </s> zab-Latn
▁Bela ti ▁tu ▁inab di id x ▁laat , ▁xí nii ▁r ld át m ɨ , ▁gul g ats b ɨ , ▁Dad ▁Jesús ▁g unii ▁chon én m ɨ ▁chiy ru ▁yop sá anac n ɨ m . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁gü ed eb , ▁ax ▁b d xi al deb ▁bur reen qui ▁cam ▁yag ▁lo ▁nez ▁ruu ▁tu by ▁pu ert ▁ax ▁b xa ic quid eb m ɨ . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁ze cl ɨ ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zan ɨ ɨ dy ▁ne ▁ze cl ɨ za ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁zan ald ▁r b ɨ x ti ad eb : ▁- ▁¡ X ti osten ▁Dios ! ▁¡ D ich os ▁ni ▁zé ed ▁pur ▁la any ! </s> zab-Latn
▁¡ D ich os ▁ni ▁zé ed ▁ina bee ▁ze cti zia c ▁to ▁x p ɨ ng ul n ɨ ▁rey ▁David ! ▁¡ X ti osten ▁X tad n ɨ ▁Dios , ▁la any ▁ni ▁r bez ny ▁lla ya baa ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ▁x quel ▁bi iu ▁Jesús ▁Jerusalén ▁ax ▁gü eny ▁lá ani ▁y ud oro o ▁x te ▁Jerusalén . ▁D eni ▁bi alo ▁b gu ia any ▁ir ate , ▁chiy ru ▁z ény ▁cun ▁ira ▁ts ɨ bti op ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁par ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Betania ▁te ▁pur ▁ag ud xi y . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bra gue el ▁deni ▁b dii ad eb ▁Betania , ▁chiy ▁guz ulo ▁r ld iaan ▁Jesús . </s> zab-Latn

▁Par zi ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁yag ▁hig qui : ▁- ▁Qu ɨ tru ▁chú uti ▁d xi ▁chú u ▁ni ▁i qui iny ▁frut ▁x ten u . ▁Ne ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁bind iag deb ▁ni ▁g uni iny . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ n deb ▁Jerusalén ▁chiy ▁bi iu ▁Jesús ▁lo ▁l d edo o ▁Jerusalén , ▁ax ▁guz ulo ▁r bé eny ▁de ▁ni ▁cat ó o ▁ne ▁de ▁ni ▁ca zii . ▁B zá ald ny ▁de ▁x m ɨ l ly ▁de ▁ni ▁r chaa ▁m ɨ ly ▁cun ▁de ▁yal li ly ▁x te ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁r tó o ▁de ▁pal om . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁qu ɨ tru ▁tu ▁b sa ant iny ▁ni un é ▁x iru ▁de ▁cos ▁lo ▁l d edo o qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁guz ulo ▁case ed ny ▁de ▁b ni ety , ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Lo ▁de ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁r nii : ▁" Li za ▁idi alá ▁yuu ▁rut ▁ina ab ▁b ni ety ▁lo ▁Dios ▁par ▁ir ate ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu . " ▁Per ▁laat ▁aba ant ɨ ni ▁ze c ▁cue v ▁x te ▁de ▁gu baan . </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁lo ▁de ▁b xo z ▁cun ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley , ▁chi ▁bind iag deb ▁ni ▁g unii ▁Jesús , ▁guz ulo ▁r gu í ily deb ▁nez ▁par ▁quin xú deb ny ▁pur ▁ni ▁r d x ib deb ▁la any ▁te ▁pur ▁ir ate ▁b ni ety ▁r d x alo ▁ni ▁r se ed ny ▁laad eb . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi ▁bra gue el ▁sidoo , ▁gu de ed deb ▁nez ▁rut ▁zub ▁yag ▁hig qui ▁ax ▁gun á deb ▁dec ▁agu bi zte cni , ▁né ru ▁laba ani . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁gü enela az ▁Bed ▁ax ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Ma istr ɨ , ▁b gu ia abi u ▁yag ▁hig ▁ni ▁gul ud é biu ▁agu bi zni . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁Gul chal dila az ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁nare ▁r gui x ti ia ▁lot ▁dec ▁bela ti ▁nuu ▁ni ▁ga ip y ▁dany re : ▁" Gu bic á ▁r uc , ▁bia b ▁lá ani ▁nis doo , " ▁ne ▁bel ▁ini ib ▁ziy ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁gun ti op la az tib ▁sino ▁que ▁chal dila az b ɨ ▁gac ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ag uni ib , ▁ax ▁za c ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ag uni ib . </s> zab-Latn
▁Pur ▁ning ui , ▁r ni ia ▁laat , ▁ir ate ▁ni ▁ina ab t ɨ ▁lo ▁Dios , ▁gul chal dila az ▁dec ▁sca atni , ▁ne ▁sca act ɨ ni . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁chi ▁ac ana ab t ɨ ▁lo ▁Dios , ▁bela ti ▁nuu ▁tu ▁b ni ety ▁r d xi ch né t , ▁gul ga any ▁perd ón b ɨ ▁te ▁par ▁cha lee ▁g ún za ▁X tad n ɨ ▁Dios ▁perd ón ▁de ▁x t uld t ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁bela ti ▁laat ▁qu ɨ t ▁g ún t ɨ ▁perd ón , ▁ziy za ▁X tad n ɨ ▁Dios ▁ni ▁r bez ▁lla ya baa ▁qu ɨ t za ▁g ún t iny ▁perd ón ▁de ▁x t uld t ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ n deb ▁Jerusalén ▁deni ▁cand za ▁Jesús ▁lani ud oro o ▁x te ▁Jerusalén , ▁chiy ▁gü eb inuu ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁lo ▁de ▁b xo z ▁la any ▁cun ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley ▁ne ▁cun ▁de ▁g urt isy ▁x te ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁Israel , </s> zab-Latn
▁ax ▁gun ab di id x deb ny : ▁- ▁¿ T ú ▁x tid x bee ▁runu ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ ? ▁¿ T ú ▁bn ɨ ɨ d x ▁li ú ▁gu el r na bee ▁par ▁g ú nu ▁ze ec ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁Z iy za ▁nare ▁inab di id xa ▁laat ▁tu by ▁cos . ▁Bela ti ▁ica ibt ɨ , ▁chiy ru ▁ini ia ▁laat ▁tú ▁x tid x bee ▁runa ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁¿ T ú ▁b xia ald ▁Ju any ▁Ba ut ist ▁par ▁b ti ub nis b ɨ ? ▁¿ Ta ▁Dios ▁b xia ald ▁laab ▁o ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu ? ▁Gul ca by . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁guz ulo ▁cay uega c deb ▁di id x ▁cun ▁saad eb , ▁ax ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁Bela ti ▁ini in ▁Dios ▁b xia ald ▁Ju any ▁Ba ut ist , ▁laab ▁sni ib ▁dun n ɨ : ▁"¿ X í nii ▁qu ɨ t ▁gü eldi laa zt ɨ b ?" </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁qu ɨ t za ▁xo ▁ini itin ▁dec ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁b xia ald ▁laab . ▁G uni id eb ▁ziy ▁pur ▁ni ▁r d x ib deb ▁de ▁b ni ety , ▁te ▁pur ▁ir ate ▁b ni ety ▁gü el dila az ▁dec ▁Ju any ▁Ba ut ist ▁guc b ɨ ▁tu by ▁profet ▁ni ▁guld í pac ▁g unii ▁x ti id x ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Par zi ▁ra ip deb ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Qu ɨ t ▁gán tin . ▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Z iy za ▁nare ▁qu ɨ t ▁ini itia ▁laat ▁tú ▁x tid x bee ▁runa ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁guz ulo ▁can iné ▁Jesús ▁laad eb ▁cun ▁p úr pac ▁de ▁cu end , ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁G uu ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁bz ub ▁de ▁yag ▁uv ▁lo ▁lli ab , ▁chiy ▁ba ania c b ɨ ▁gur r aly ▁idu ib rd onte c . ▁Chi y ru ▁ban chuu zac b ɨ ▁lá ani ▁rut ▁il lii ▁qu ia ▁de ▁uv qui , ▁ne ▁b zu ub zac b ɨ ▁tu by ▁yuu ▁yaa ▁par ▁ya ap ▁idu ib te ▁lo ▁lli ab qui . ▁' C hiy ru ▁gu ledi in b ɨ ni ▁lo ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁nán ▁run ▁dz ɨ ɨ ny ▁x te ▁uv ▁ax ▁zé ga c b ɨ , ▁zit ▁nez ▁rut ▁gü elde z b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁ni ▁gac ▁ir uld ▁uv , ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁tu by ▁x mos b ɨ ▁par ▁ch alli i ▁ni ▁ri ál db ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁guna az deb ▁mos qui , ▁b taa z deb ▁laab ▁ax ▁b zie ec quid eb ▁laab ▁sin ▁x íte ete . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁x tenni ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁stu by ▁mos . ▁Per ▁ziy ga c ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁b cua ad eb ▁guia ▁mos qui , ▁b ldá ad eb ▁qu ia b ▁ne ▁gud é deb ▁lob . </s> zab-Latn
▁B niet qui ▁gub íi ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁stu by ▁mos . ▁Per ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁ax ▁gud inx ú ga c deb ▁mos qui . ▁Zi enz iru ▁mos ▁b xia ald b ɨ , ▁nu ude b ▁b da az deb ▁ne ▁nu uz ad eb ▁gud inx ú ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁laad eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁' Par zi ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁x tenni ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui , ▁all inga antis b ɨ ▁rie ed x ▁ix ia ald b ɨ ▁ne ▁qu esenti and ▁r ca az b ɨ ▁ll inga an b ɨ qui . ▁Ax ▁b xia ald b ɨ ▁laab ▁te ▁pur ▁baan b ɨ ▁x gab , ▁g uni ib : ▁" Z appa c deb ▁did x doo ▁lli inia . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁ra ip iac deb ▁saad eb : ▁" B niet qu ɨ y ▁ná ▁ni ▁y anné ▁liu ▁rut ▁nuu ▁uv qu ɨ . ▁Gul too ▁idin x ún b ɨ ▁te ▁ga cni ▁x ten n ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ▁x quel ▁guc . ▁G una az deb ▁laab , ▁gud inx ú deb ▁laab , ▁chiy ru ▁gul é ed eb ▁laab ▁lo ▁liu qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁gun ab di id x ny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁can in ény : ▁- ▁An re , ▁¿ xi ▁r lil ot ▁g ún ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁x tenni ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui ? ▁R gui x ti ia ▁lot ▁dec ▁laab ▁ze ed b ɨ ▁par ▁quin xú b ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁ax ▁s de ed b ɨ ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui ▁stu by ▁de ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁' ¿ Ta ▁g ady ▁gu uld t ɨ ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁rut ▁r nii ?: ▁Gu ia ▁ni ▁al di ▁gu legu un ▁de ▁ni ▁rzu ub ▁yuu , ▁guia qui ▁ná ▁ni ▁maz ru ▁bl li ú ▁par ▁guz ub ▁yuu qui . </s> zab-Latn

▁T eru ▁chú u ▁d xi ▁ni ▁g ún ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ent ria gu ▁laga c ▁bets deb ▁par ▁gaty deb . ▁Chi y ▁de ▁dad ▁g ún deb ▁ent ria gu ▁laga c ▁de ▁lli inde b . ▁Ne ▁ter uza ▁g ún za ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ent ria gu ▁laga c ▁x t adde b ▁ne ▁x nan deb ▁par ▁gaty deb . </s> zab-Latn

▁Z iy ▁x quel ▁guc ▁cumplir ▁de ▁di id x ▁ni ▁b c uaa ▁profet ▁Isaías , ▁te ▁pur ▁laab ▁b cua ab : ▁Rí eny ▁r see ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁r b ɨ x tia ▁nez ▁lo ▁yiu biz ▁rut ▁qu ɨ t ▁tu ▁r bez ti ▁ax ▁r ni ib : ▁" G ul gan za ac ▁nez ▁x te ▁X tad n ɨ . ▁Gul xal ▁tu by ▁nez ld í . </s> zab-Latn

▁Lá ani ▁yudo o qui ▁nuu ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁ni ▁nuu ▁tu by ▁b ɨ nd xab ▁lá ani ▁laz do oni ▁ax ▁gur ɨ x ti ab : </s> zab-Latn
▁- ▁B saan biu ▁dun n ɨ , ▁Jesús ▁de ▁Nazaret . ▁¿ X í nii ▁ri uté biu ▁cun ▁dun n ɨ ? ▁¿ Ta ▁zé ed biu ▁par ▁init lo biu ▁dun n ɨ ? ▁N are ▁r umbi ia ▁laa biu , ▁ne ▁nán na ▁dec ▁laa biu ▁ná biu ▁B ni ety ▁sant ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn

▁I rated eb ▁b d xal od eb ▁chi ▁gun á deb ▁gu el r na ber oo ▁x te ▁Dios . ▁Lal zi ▁laad eb ▁qu esenti and ▁r d xal od eb ▁pur ▁de ▁cos ▁ni ▁run ▁Jesús , ▁la any ▁ra ip ny ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny : </s> zab-Latn
▁- ▁Gul cu adia g za ac ▁ni ▁ini ia ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t ▁yi an laa zt itni . ▁N are ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios , ▁za ca ▁ent ria gu ▁la zna a ▁de ▁b ɨ ny . </s> zab-Latn

▁' La at , ▁de ▁x mig uaa , ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁id x ibt ɨ ▁de ▁ni ▁r ca az ▁quin xú ▁laat . ▁Te ▁tu tix ▁zele e ▁quin xú ▁x cuer p ɨ t , ▁per ▁sp í rit ▁x tent ɨ ▁rute ete ▁qu ɨ t ▁tu ▁cha le eti ▁ig ua ald ni . </s> zab-Latn

▁R icu qui ▁cua ib b ɨ : ▁" Qu ɨ t ▁x oti , ▁x tada ▁Abraham , ▁per ▁bela ti ▁ib ány ▁tu by ▁b ɨ ng uty ▁ne ▁cha li ul ob ▁lod eb ▁chiy ru ▁laad eb ▁z iala az deb ▁pur ▁de ▁x t uld deb . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Abraham ▁ra ip y ▁laab : ▁" B ela ti ▁laad eb ▁qu ɨ t ▁run deb ▁cu end ▁x ti id x ▁Moisés ▁ne ▁de ▁profet , ▁¿ xó lesa ▁chal dila az deb ▁mas qu ɨ ▁ib ány ▁tu by ▁b ɨ ng uty ?" </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ra ip ny ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny : ▁- ▁Nuu pac ▁de ▁cos ▁ni ▁cug ue egu ▁b ni ety ▁par ▁g ún b ɨ ▁d uld . ▁Per , ▁¡ prob ll ɨ za ▁ná ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁cug ue egu ▁stu by ▁b ni ety ▁par ▁g ún ▁d uld ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Par ▁laab ▁gü en ru ▁su ▁il di ib deb ▁tu by ▁guia ▁x te ▁mul in ▁gu ɨ ny b ɨ ▁par ▁cha zá ald deb ▁laab ▁lo ▁nis doo , ▁x lat ▁ni ▁cug ue eg ub ɨ ▁tu by ▁de ▁ni ▁teste ▁gü el dila az ▁nare . </s> zab-Latn
▁Gul cu alo ▁laat . ▁' B ela ti ▁xi ▁tu by ▁mal ▁g ún ▁tu by ▁de ▁soo , ▁bl ɨ d x b ɨ , ▁ne ▁bela ti ▁y iala az b ɨ ▁pur ▁ni ▁baan b ɨ ▁ax ▁ba any ▁perd ón b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Mas qu ɨ ▁g adz ▁gü elt ▁lá ani ▁tu by ▁d xi ▁chú u ▁xi ▁ini ib ▁o ▁gun né zac b ɨ ▁li ú , ▁ne ▁bela ti ▁g adz ▁gü elt za ▁gu edni ib ▁li ú : ▁" Ba any ▁perd ón ▁nare , ▁aqu ɨ tru ▁ib í iti ▁g úna ▁ziy , " ▁ná ▁par ▁g ú nu ▁perd ón b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁de ▁apóstol ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁B gua ad ru biu ▁dun n ɨ ▁maz ru ▁gu el rel dila az . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁cua by ▁Jesús ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁Bela ti ▁rel di laa zt ɨ , ▁mas qu ɨ ▁ze c zi pac ▁tu by ▁biny ▁x te ▁mos ta za ▁ná ▁gu el rel dila az ▁x tent ɨ , ▁zele e ▁ga ipt ɨ ▁yag ▁sic óm or ore : ▁" Bi ia x ▁r uc ▁chiy ▁qu eg ües ub ▁lo ▁nis doo , " ▁ne ▁yag qu ɨ ▁scu adia gni ▁x ti id xt ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁' I zu ub zin ▁bela ti ▁tub yt ɨ ▁nap b ɨ ▁tu by ▁mos ▁chiy ▁chi ▁guia ad ▁mos qui ▁bela ti ▁gü ega an b ɨ ▁o ▁gü ega p zac b ɨ ▁de ▁lad xaa , ▁¿ t atix ▁za ipt ɨ b : ▁" B ii u , ▁guri ▁te ▁i qui iniu ?, " </s> zab-Latn
▁sino ▁que ▁za ipt ɨ b : ▁" B chu ▁chiy ▁ban chuu ▁ni ▁i qui inia ▁ne ▁ba any ▁cu end ▁nare ▁lal zi ▁ca qui inia ▁ne ▁c agu í ia ▁chi ▁l d ull ▁i qui inia ▁chiy ru ▁aze lee ▁i qui iniu ▁ne ▁gu ɨ iu . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁ni cl ɨ d xa ▁x ti osten ▁qu ɨ t ▁ga ipt ɨ b ▁pur ▁ni ▁cay untis b ɨ ▁ni ▁ri ál d ▁g ún b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy za qu ɨ y ▁laat , ▁chi ▁l d ull ▁g ún t ɨ ▁ir ate ▁ni ▁guna bee ▁Dios ▁laat , ▁chiy ▁gul nii : ▁" Na iz n ɨ ▁de ▁mos ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁illi ú ▁te ▁pur ▁b d x antis n ɨ ▁ni ▁ri ál d ▁id x ann ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn
▁D eni ▁zé ▁Jesús ▁par ▁Jerusalén ▁chiy ▁gu de ed ny ▁nez ▁rut ▁d xaa ▁Samaria ▁cun ▁Galilea . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁chi ▁ze yii uny ▁lá ani ▁tu by ▁gu ɨ d xi in , ▁gü ech alo ▁ts ɨ ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁ni ▁rac ▁gu el gu id x ▁ni ▁lá ▁le pra ▁la any . ▁Per ▁zit ▁x quel ▁guz ug ua ad eb </s> zab-Latn
▁r b ɨ x ti ad eb : ▁- ▁¡ Jes ús , ▁Ma istr ɨ , ▁blas la az biu ▁dun n ɨ ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁gun á ▁Jesús ▁laad eb ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Gul chali uu ▁laat ▁lo ▁de ▁b xo z . ▁Ne ▁lal zi ▁deni ▁zé deb , ▁b ía ▁t ɨ ɨ x deb ▁x te ▁gu el gu id x ▁ni ▁rac deb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁tu by b ɨ ▁deni ▁guc be eb ▁dec ▁ab iac b ɨ , ▁ax ▁bie c qu ib ɨ ▁r b ɨ x ti ab ▁r ni ib ▁de ▁di id x ▁za ac ▁lo ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁gu zul li bb ɨ ▁lo ▁Jesús , ▁gu zu tec ▁lob ▁lo ▁liu ▁par ▁b de ed b ɨ ▁gra cy ny . ▁Ne ▁b ni ety ▁Samaria ▁laab . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁g unii ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁¿ Ta ▁gati ▁ts ɨ ▁ná ▁de ▁ni ▁b sia ca ? ▁¿ C ún ll ɨ ▁dz ɨ ▁ga ad eb ? </s> zab-Latn
▁¿ Ta ▁tu by zi ▁b ni ety ▁z ít re ▁bie c qui ▁ini i ▁de ▁di id x ▁za ac ▁lo ▁Dios ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laab : ▁- ▁Qu eg ües ú . ▁Qu eg ü e . ▁Ab ia cu ▁pur ▁ni ▁gü eldi laa zu . </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁farise u ▁gun ab di id x deb ▁Jesús ▁g úc qu ɨ ▁id z ɨ ny ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios , ▁ax ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁X quel ▁ni ▁id z ɨ ny ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ▁qu ɨ t ▁n át ini ▁ni ▁cha lee ▁yi an lot . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁qu ɨ t za ▁tu ▁ini iti : ▁" Any ▁zug uaa ▁rur é , " ▁o ▁" Any ▁re , " ▁te ▁pur ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ▁ania ▁zug uaa ▁gla yt ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ra ip ny ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny : ▁- ▁T eru ▁id z ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁chi ▁ica a zt ɨ ▁ini át ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁masi u ▁tu by ▁d xi , ▁per ▁qu ɨ t ▁ini át it ▁naa . </s> zab-Latn
▁Mas qu ɨ ▁chú u ▁ni ▁ini i ▁laat : ▁" Ab zug uaa ▁rur én , " ▁o ▁" Ab zug uaa ▁nez re . " ▁Per ▁qu ɨ t ▁chan ald tit deb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁ze c qu ɨ ▁chi ▁r d ini ia ▁ax ▁r ca ▁b chá a ▁lla ya baa ▁de ▁tu by ▁lad ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁stu by ▁lad , ▁zi yti zia cza qu ɨ y ▁gac ▁d xi ▁ni ▁gu elda ▁stu by ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁n ido ote ▁ná ▁par ▁teda ▁gu el zii ▁qu esenti and , ▁ne ▁ga ca ▁des pres y ▁pur ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁tiam pan ré . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ze c ▁ni ▁guc ▁gula l qui ▁chi ▁gub ány ▁Noé , ▁ziy ga cza ▁gac ▁d xi ▁ni ▁gu elda ▁stu by ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁chiy ▁b qui inde b , ▁gü é ed eb , ▁bi ch na ad eb , ▁ne ▁b de edz ad eb ▁lli inde b ▁par ▁gu ch naa ▁a xt qu ɨ ▁chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁d xi ▁ni ▁bi iu ▁Noé ▁lá ani ▁bar c uro o ▁ni ▁ban chu ub ▁ax ▁guz ulo ▁nis gui ad ux ▁ni ▁gud inx ú ▁ir ated eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ga cza ▁guc ▁chi ▁gub ány ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁b di alá ▁Lot ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu : ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁b qui inde b , ▁gü é ed eb , ▁b tó od eb ▁ne ▁gu zi id eb , ▁gu zib inde b ▁ir alo te ▁ne ▁b zu ub deb ▁de ▁yuu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁chi ▁b di ia ▁Lot ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x ▁Sodoma , ▁guz ulo ▁ria b ▁gui ▁lla ya baa ▁cun ▁azu fr ɨ , ▁ax ▁gut y ▁ir ated eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy ti zia cza ▁gac ▁d xi ▁ni ▁gu elda ▁stu by ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁' D xi ▁ni ▁gac ▁ziy , ▁bela ti ▁nuu ▁ni ▁zug uaa ▁qu ia ▁yuu ▁qu ɨ t ▁yi atti b ▁par ▁ch alde eb ▁de ▁xix ten b ɨ ▁ni ▁nu chuu ▁lani uu . ▁Ne ▁bela ti ▁nuu ▁ni ▁zug uaa ▁lo ▁gui ix , ▁qu ɨ t ▁ya ic qu it ib ▁liz b ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Gul ch anela az ▁xa ▁x quel ▁gu de ed ▁chi al ▁Lot . </s> zab-Latn
▁El qu ɨ ▁ni ▁maz ru ▁run ▁pur ▁gu el nab ány ▁ni ▁nap b ɨ ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch li uré ▁z uu ▁chi ▁init b ɨ ni . ▁Per ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁gaty ▁pur ▁nare , ▁zap b ɨ ▁gu el nab ány ▁lla ya baa . </s> zab-Latn
▁' N are ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁dec ▁gu xin qui ▁rut ▁ná gaa ▁ti op deb ▁lo ▁tu by zi ▁lu un , ▁tu by b ɨ ▁ze , ▁stu by b ɨ ▁yá an . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁rut ▁cay ut ▁ti op ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁guna a ▁tu by zi ▁lat , ▁tu by b ɨ ▁ze , ▁stu by b ɨ ▁yá an . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁ti op ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁lo ▁gui ix , ▁tu by b ɨ ▁ze , ▁stu by b ɨ ▁yá an . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁ziy ▁ax ▁ra ip deb ▁la any : ▁- ▁¿ C alí , ▁Dad ? ▁Chi y ▁Jesús ▁cua ib ny ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁Rut ▁ná gaa ▁tu by ▁many g uty ▁ru y ▁r d x asaa ▁de ▁be ch . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ben ény ▁laad eb ▁tu by ▁cu end , ▁par ▁b se ed ny ▁laad eb ▁dec ▁ná pac ▁par ▁ina ab deb ▁lo ▁Dios ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁cha xa cla az ti deb . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁G uu ▁tu by ▁gu ɨ d x ▁rut ▁guu ▁tu by ▁jue z . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁b d x ib tib ▁Dios , ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t za ▁ba anti b ▁cu end ▁de ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁laga cza ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x qui ▁r be zza ▁tu by ▁guna a ▁vi ud , ▁ax ▁rena abb ɨ ▁lo ▁jue z qui ▁par ▁g ún b ɨ ▁casti gu ▁tu by ▁ni ▁r d xi ch né ▁guna a qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁jue z qui ▁x chi ▁qu ɨ t ▁ba anti b ▁cu end ▁guna a ▁vi ud qui , ▁per ▁chiy ru ▁ax ▁ba any ▁jue z qui ▁x gab ▁nab : ▁" Mas qu ɨ ▁qu ɨ t ▁r d x ibia ▁Dios , ▁ne ▁qu ɨ t ▁runa ▁cu end ▁de ▁b ni ety , </s> zab-Latn
▁per ▁guna ac ▁zé laa ▁cay un b ɨ ▁stor b ɨ ▁nare . ▁Gü en ru ▁gac ní ab ▁par ▁qu ɨ tru ▁cha laa ▁gue ed b ɨ ▁an ste ▁ch ad xa ▁paci ency ▁x tena . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Z iy ▁x quel ▁g unii ▁jue z ▁mal qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Pur ▁ning ui , ▁lati x cu ▁Dios ▁qu ɨ t ▁gac né ny ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁x ten ny ▁ni ▁ag ul ény ▁chi ▁r na ab deb ▁lony ▁r d xi ▁ne ▁gu xin . ▁Ne , ▁¿ t atix ▁za cl daa ▁gac né ny ▁laad eb ? </s> zab-Latn
▁N are ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁dec ▁za c né ny ▁laad eb ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁ga cl da at iny . ▁Per ▁chi ▁gu elda ▁stu by ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios , ▁¿ tu guan ▁la ▁sd xi al rua ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁rel dila az ▁Dios ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch liu ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ben ény ▁laad eb ▁stu by ▁cu end , ▁par ▁de ▁ni ▁r lilo ▁ná ▁b ɨ n za ac , ▁chiy ▁run deb ▁des pres y ▁stu by ▁de ▁b ni ety , ▁ax ▁g uni iny : </s> zab-Latn
▁- ▁Ti op ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁gü ed eb ▁lani ud oro o ▁x te ▁Jerusalén ▁gü ena ab deb ▁lo ▁Dios : ▁tu by b ɨ ▁ná ▁farise u , ▁stu by b ɨ ▁ax ▁ná ▁cob r ador ▁x te ▁impu est . </s> zab-Latn
▁Farise u qui , ▁guz uld í b ▁guna abb ɨ ▁lo ▁Dios ▁s qué : ▁" X ti osten ▁laa biu , ▁X tada ▁Dios , ▁te ▁pur ▁nare ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná tia ▁ze c ▁stu by ▁de ▁b ɨ ny , ▁ze c ▁de ▁ni ▁ná ▁gu baan , ▁de ▁ni ▁ná ▁mal , ▁de ▁ni ▁nap ▁stu by ▁guna a , ▁per ▁ni cl ɨ ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ná ▁cob rad ore ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná tia . </s> zab-Latn
▁N are ▁r cu u ana ▁ti op ▁gü elt ▁lá ani ▁tu x man , ▁ne ▁r n ɨ ɨ d x za ca ▁die zm ɨ ▁x te ▁ir ate ▁ni ▁runa ▁gan . " </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁cob r ador ▁x te ▁impu est qui , ▁zit ▁guz ug ua ab ▁ne ▁ni cl ɨ ▁qu ɨ t ▁ba anti b ▁pur ▁n ildi as lob ▁lla ya baa , ▁sino ▁que ▁r gap b ɨ ▁rula z do ob ▁r ni iga b : ▁"¡ X tada ▁Dios , ▁blas la az biu ▁nare ▁naa ▁tu by ▁b ɨ nd uld !" </s> zab-Latn
▁N are ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁dec ▁cob r ador ▁x te ▁impu est qui ▁aba any ▁Dios ▁perd ón ▁laab ▁chi ▁bie c qu ib ɨ ▁liz b ɨ , ▁per ▁farise u qui ▁qu ɨ t ▁ba ant iny ▁perd ón ▁laab . ▁Te ▁pur ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁r z ub yaa ▁laga c ▁la ani ▁qu ɨ t ▁xi ▁sa cti b ▁nez ▁lo ▁Dios . ▁Per ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁run bi chi in , ▁laab ɨ y ▁maz ru ▁sac b ɨ ▁nez ▁lo ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy za ▁gü ené ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁de ▁b nini in ▁rut ▁zug uaa ▁Jesús ▁par ▁ig ua ald ny ▁laad eby . ▁Per ▁chi ▁gun á ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁ziy , ▁guz ulo ▁r d ild né deb ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁gü ené ▁laad eby . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁gur ɨ d x ny ▁laad eb , ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Gul saan ▁gu ed ná ▁de ▁b nini in ▁nare , ▁qu ɨ tru ▁r cu at . ▁Te ▁pur ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ▁ná ▁par ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁ze c ▁laad eby . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁dec ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁rel dila az ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ▁ze c ▁tu by ▁b nini in ré , ▁qu ɨ t ▁cha le eti ▁yii ub ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Tub y ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁gun ab di id x b ɨ ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Gü en ▁Ma istr ɨ , ▁¿ Xi ▁ri ál d ▁g úna ▁par ▁g apa ▁gu el nab ány ▁par ▁cha zy ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ra ip ny ▁laab : ▁- ▁¿ X í nii ▁r ni iu ▁dec ▁gü en ▁naa ? ▁Qu ɨ tru ▁tu ▁ná ti ▁gü en , ▁qu es ol tis y ▁Dios ▁ná ▁gü en . </s> zab-Latn
▁Li ú ▁nán nu ▁de ▁mand ami ent : ▁" Qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁gapu ▁stu by ▁guna a . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁quin xú tiu ▁b ni ety . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁ga ctiu ▁gu baan . ▁Qu ɨ t ▁gü e eti u ▁dix ú ▁pur ▁de ▁b ni ety . ▁G úp ▁did x doo ▁x t adu ▁cun ▁x n anu . " </s> zab-Latn
▁B niet qui ▁ra ip b ɨ ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Ir ate ▁de ▁cos qu ɨ ▁cay una ▁des d ɨ ▁chi ▁naa ▁bi chi in . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁bind iag ▁Jesús ▁ziy ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laab : ▁- ▁Per ▁rie ed x ▁g ú nu ▁stu by ▁cos : ▁gü et ó o ▁ir ate ▁de ▁ni ▁rá pu ▁ax ▁b de ed ▁m ɨ ly qui ▁de ▁prob , ▁te ▁ziy ▁x quel ▁gapu ▁gu elna za ac ▁lla ya baa . ▁Chi ▁ab tó o ▁de ▁xix ten u , ▁ax ▁qued an ald ▁nare . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁chi ▁bind iag ▁b niet qui ▁ziy , ▁qu esenti and ▁na las ▁bi ian b ɨ , ▁te ▁pur ▁la ▁ric u ▁ná b . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁gun á ▁Jesús ▁dec ▁laab ▁na las ▁nu ub , ▁ax ▁g uni iny : ▁- ▁¡ Qu esenti and qu ɨ za ▁nag án ▁par ▁yii u ▁de ▁ric u ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Maz ru ▁sen ciy ▁teed ▁tu by ▁came y ▁gu ɨ ɨ dy ▁x te ▁tu by ▁gu ɨ ch g ull , ▁que ▁par ▁yii u ▁tu by ▁ric u ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁de ▁ni ▁bind iag ▁ni ▁g unii ▁Jesús ▁ax ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁¿ T ú lesa ▁cha lee ▁gac ▁perd ón ▁lo ▁Dios ▁pur ▁de ▁x t uld ni ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁cua by ▁Jesús ▁lod eb : ▁- ▁Nuu ▁ni ▁nag án ▁par ▁b ni ety ▁gu ɨ ch liu , ▁per ▁par ▁Dios ▁x íte ete ▁nag án ti . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁Bed ▁la any : ▁- ▁Dad , ▁dun n ɨ ▁abs á ann ɨ ▁ir ate ▁ni ▁r d x ap n ɨ ▁par ▁izan ald n ɨ ▁laa biu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ax ▁cua ib ny : ▁- ▁N are ▁r gui x ti ia ▁lot , ▁dec ▁tu tix ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁r sá an ▁li zni , ▁chi alni , ▁de ▁bets ni , ▁o ▁x tad ni , ▁o ▁x nan ni , ▁o ▁de ▁lli inni , ▁pur ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios , </s> zab-Latn
▁laab ▁maz ru ▁zi eny ▁ni ▁ic á ab ▁lo ▁gu ɨ ch li uré . ▁Ne ▁zap b ɨ ▁gu el nab ány ▁par ▁cha zy ▁lla ya baa . </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁gur ɨ d x ny ▁ts ɨ bti op ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁tu by ▁lad , ▁ax ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁An re ▁cho on ▁Jerusalén ▁rut ▁gac ▁ze c ▁ni ▁b c uaa ▁de ▁profet ▁lo ▁gui its ▁pur ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z undeb ▁ent ria gu ▁nare ▁lo ▁de ▁b ɨ nz ít , ▁ax ▁z undeb ▁bur l ɨ ▁nare , ▁ir alo zy ▁ni ▁ini id eb ▁naa ▁ne ▁sti ux ɨ ́ n deb ▁lua a . </s> zab-Latn
▁S taa z deb ▁nare , ▁chiy ru ▁quin xú deb ▁naa . ▁Per ▁ni ▁ri on ▁d xi ▁ni ▁ag utia , ▁s bí i ▁ib án ia ▁stu by . </s> zab-Latn

▁Per ▁chi ▁gun á ▁de ▁b ɨ n qui ▁laab , ▁ax ▁ra ip deb ▁saad eb : ▁" La ab ɨ y ▁ná ▁ni ▁y anné ▁liu ▁rut ▁nuu ▁uv qu ɨ . ▁Gul too ▁idin x ún b ɨ , ▁par ▁cha lee ▁gac ▁gu ɨ ch li uc ▁x ten n ɨ . " </s> zab-Latn

▁R gui x ti ia ▁lot ▁dec ▁laab ▁ze ed b ɨ ▁par ▁quin xú b ▁laad eb ▁ne ▁s de ed b ɨ ▁gu ɨ ch liu qui ▁stu by ▁de ▁b ni ety . ▁Chi ▁bind iag deb ▁ziy ▁ax ▁g uni id eb : ▁- ▁¡ Qu ɨ t ▁cu ela az ▁Dios ▁gac ▁ziy ! </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁Jesús ▁b gu ia any ▁lod eb ▁ax ▁g uni iny : ▁- ▁Bela ti ▁gati ▁zig ui y , ▁¿ xi ▁zelo ▁ni ▁cá ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁rut ▁r nii ?: ▁Gu ia ▁ni ▁al di ▁gu legu un ▁de ▁ni ▁rzu ub ▁yuu , ▁guia qui ▁ná ▁ni ▁maz ru ▁bl li ú ▁par ▁guz ub ▁yuu qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁T utix ▁ni ▁l dap ▁guia qui , ▁laab ▁s de ed b ɨ ▁gu el zii . ▁Per ▁bela ti ▁guia qui ▁yab ni ▁qu ia ▁b ni ety ▁ax ▁s nit lo tec ni ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁De ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁cun ▁de ▁ma istr ɨ ▁ni ▁nán ▁ley ▁hó rac qui ▁r ca az deb ▁nina az deb ▁Jesús , ▁te ▁pur ▁guc beed eb ▁dec ▁ni ▁g uni iny ▁ná ▁contr ɨ ▁laad eb , ▁per ▁b d x ib deb ▁de ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Gul de ed ▁César ▁ni ▁ná ▁x te ▁César , ▁ne ▁gul de ed ▁Dios ▁ni ▁ná ▁x te ▁Dios . ▁Ax ▁qu ɨ t ▁xi ▁dix ú ti ▁b d xi al deb ▁nic ua qui ad eb ▁la any ▁pur ▁de ▁ni ▁g uni iny ▁nez ▁lo ▁ir ate ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁bi iu ▁b ɨ nd xab ▁lá ani ▁laz doo ▁tu by ▁de ▁x p ɨ n ny ▁ni ▁lá ▁Judas ▁ni ▁ra ip zad eb ▁Is c ario te . </s> zab-Latn
▁Judas ▁gü enin éb ▁de ▁b xo z ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁de ▁b xo z ▁cun ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁ni ▁r na bee ▁yudo o , ▁ax ▁ben éb ▁laad eb ▁di id x ▁xa ▁x quel ▁g ún b ɨ ▁ent ria gu ▁Jesús ▁la zna ad eb . </s> zab-Latn
▁La ad eb ▁gu za cla az deb ▁ax ▁g uni id eb ▁ide ed deb ▁m ɨ ly ▁laab . </s> zab-Latn
▁La ab ▁guz igu elda c b ɨ ▁ax ▁guz ulo ▁r gu í il yb ɨ ▁nez ▁par ▁g ún b ɨ ▁ent ria gu ▁Jesús ▁sin ▁qu ɨ t ▁gac be eti ▁de ▁b ni ety . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁lan í ▁x te ▁pas cu ▁d xi ▁ni ▁r qui inde b ▁gue ch ti ly ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁ruu ti ▁le vad ur , ▁ne ▁chi ▁r gu inde b ▁tu by ▁l lí ily , </s> zab-Latn
▁chiy ▁guna bee ▁Jesús ▁Bed ▁cun ▁Ju any , ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Gul ch agan chuu ▁ni ▁i qui inn ɨ ▁gu xin ▁x te ▁pas cu . </s> zab-Latn
▁La ad eb ▁gun ab di id x deb ▁la any : ▁- ▁¿ C alí ▁r ca az biu ▁cho gan chu uni ? </s> zab-Latn
▁Jesús ▁ra ip y ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Chi ▁yii ut ▁lá ani ▁gu ɨ d x , ▁ax ▁ini át ▁tu by ▁b ni ety ▁ng uiu ▁ni ▁z éne ▁tu by ▁rii ▁nis . ▁Gul chan ald b ɨ ▁a xt isy ▁rut ▁yii ub , </s> zab-Latn
▁ax ▁gul g ats ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁ná ▁li zni ▁ru y : ▁" Z iy la ▁ná ▁Ma istr ɨ : ▁¿ C ún ▁lani uu ▁ni ▁i qu inn ía ▁de ▁x p ɨ nn ia ▁ang ux in ▁x te ▁pas cu ?" </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁laab ▁ili u ub ▁laat ▁tu by ▁yuu ▁ni ▁r rop ▁pis , ▁ne ▁ana za ac ll ga ▁lá an qui . ▁R uy ▁gul gan chuu ▁ni ▁i qui inn ɨ ▁gu xin qui . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁gü ed eb ▁ne ▁b d xi al deb ▁ir ate ▁ze ct isy ▁ni ▁ra ip y ▁Jesús ▁laad eb . ▁Ax ▁ban chuu deb ▁ni ▁i qui inde b ▁gu xin ▁x te ▁pas cu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi ▁b dz ɨ ny ▁hor , ▁Jesús ▁cun ▁de ▁apóstol ▁gur id eb ▁lo ▁m ɨ l ly . </s> zab-Latn

▁Te ▁pur ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁dec ▁aqu ɨ tru ▁chú uti ▁d xi ▁i qu inn ía ▁laat ▁sino ▁que ▁a xt isy ▁lo ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ▁cu á any ▁tu by ▁cop ▁vin , ▁ne ▁chi ▁gul ull ▁b de ed ny ▁gra cy ▁Dios , ▁ax ▁g uni iny : ▁- ▁Gul c áa ▁vin ré , ▁g ulti izni ▁lo ▁ir ate ct ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁nare ▁r ni ia ▁laat ▁dec ▁aqu ɨ tru ▁chú uti ▁d xi ▁i qui inia ▁vin , ▁a xt isy ▁d xi ▁ni ▁id z ɨ ny ▁gu el r na bee ▁x te ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn
▁Chi y ru ▁cu á any ▁gue ch ti ly , ▁ne ▁chi ▁gul ull ▁b de ed ny ▁gra cy ▁Dios , ▁ax ▁bll ull ny ▁gue ch til qui , ▁par ▁b de ed ny ▁laad eb ▁ne ▁g uni ig any : ▁- ▁Gue ch til ré ▁ná ▁cuer p ɨ ▁x tena ▁ni ▁aba ania ▁ent ria gu ▁par ▁gat ia ▁pur ▁laat . ▁Ne ▁chi ▁g ún t ɨ ▁ze ec , ▁gul ga any ni ▁pur ▁ni ▁rene laa zt ɨ ▁nare . </s> zab-Latn
▁Ne ▁zi yti zia c ▁baan ny ▁cun ▁cop ▁ni ▁nuu ▁vin ▁chi ▁gul ull ▁baan ny ▁cen , ▁ax ▁g uni iny : ▁- ▁Vin ré ▁ná ▁r ɨ ny ▁x tena ▁ni ▁ix í ia ▁chi ▁gat ia ▁par ▁il lal ▁tu by ▁nez ▁cub y ▁xa ▁gap ▁b ni ety ▁perd ón ▁lo ▁Dios . </s> zab-Latn

▁Per ▁nare ▁B ni ety ▁ni ▁b xia ald ▁Dios ▁ná ▁par ▁teda ▁ze c ▁ni ▁a ▁ná ▁par ▁teda . ▁Per , ▁¡ prob ll ɨ za ▁ná ▁b ni ety ▁ni ▁g ún ▁ent ria gu ▁nare ! </s> zab-Latn

▁Per ▁Jesús ▁ra ip y ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Lo ▁gu ɨ ch li uré ▁de ▁rey ▁r na beed eb ▁de ▁b ɨ n lad x deb ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r ca az deb , ▁ne ▁de ▁ni ▁r na bee , ▁r nii ▁de ▁b ni ety ▁dec ▁laad eb ▁run deb ▁ze c ▁ni ▁ri ál d . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁laat ▁qu ɨ t ▁ná ti ▁par ▁g ún t ɨ ▁ziy ▁sino ▁que ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁maz ru ▁sac ▁lot , ▁ná ▁par ▁g ún b ɨ ▁laab ▁ze c ▁tu by ▁ni ▁gul lie e zy ▁sac . ▁Ne ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁r na bee , ▁laab ▁ná ▁par ▁g ún b ɨ ▁laab ▁ze c ▁tu by ▁ni ▁run ▁sir v ɨ . </s> zab-Latn
▁Lo ▁gu ɨ ch li uré ▁de ▁lám ▁r z ub deb ▁lo ▁m ɨ l ly , ▁ax ▁de ▁mos ▁run ▁sir v ɨ ▁lod eb . ▁Per ▁rur én ▁qu ɨ t ▁caya cti ▁ziy ▁te ▁pur ▁nare ▁zugu an ía a ▁laat ▁ze c ▁tu by ▁ni ▁cay un ▁sir v ɨ ▁lot . </s> zab-Latn

▁ne ▁s qui int ɨ ▁lo ▁m ɨ l ly ▁x tena ▁rut ▁ina bi ia ▁ne ▁s beza ct ɨ ▁lo ▁de ▁yal li ly ▁par ▁g ún t ɨ ▁gu elg urt isy ▁ir ate ▁de ▁ni ▁zá ▁lo ▁ts ɨ bti op ▁family ▁x te ▁Israel . </s> zab-Latn
▁Z iy za ▁g unii ▁Jesús : ▁- ▁Sim óny , ▁Sim óny , ▁b gu iaa ▁cani oo , ▁b ɨ nd xab ▁ag udi in ▁laat , ▁par ▁id z ɨ by b ɨ ▁laat ▁ze c ▁chi ▁r bi iby ▁tri gu . </s> zab-Latn
▁Per ▁nare ▁ag una aba ▁lo ▁Dios ▁pur ▁li ú ▁par ▁qu ɨ t ▁isa anu ▁ni ▁rel di laa zu ▁nare . ▁Ne ▁chi ▁ag ub íi ▁rel di laa zu ▁nare ▁stu by , ▁Bed , ▁guc né ▁de ▁soo ▁par ▁su tip né deb ▁ni ▁rel dila az deb ▁nare . </s> zab-Latn

▁Chi y ▁ra ip ny ▁laad eb : ▁- ▁Per ▁an re ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁nap ▁m ɨ ly ▁ne ▁bol s ▁ná ▁par ▁ic á ab ni . ▁Ne ▁el qu ɨ ▁ni ▁qu ɨ t ▁ráp ▁spad , ▁it ó ob ▁x abb ɨ ▁par ▁si ib ▁tu by ni . </s> zab-Latn
▁Te ▁pur ▁ab dz ɨ ny ▁hor ▁ni ▁cha ga c ▁ze c ▁ni ▁r nii ▁lo ▁x qui its ▁Dios ▁pur ▁nare ▁rut ▁r nii : ▁" Ne ▁gulu cu end deb ▁laab ▁lo ▁de ▁b ɨ ny ▁mal . " ▁Ir ate ▁ni ▁cá ▁lo ▁x qui its ny ▁pur ▁nare ▁ná ▁par ▁gac ▁ziy . </s> zab-Latn
